description: Aplikace “MS Fest 2013” je praktickým průvodcem pro účastníky konference MS Fest 2013. MS Fest je tradiční dvoudenní víkendová konference, kterou pořádají Microsoft Student Partners. Program konference nabízí dva dny plné přednášek o vývoji aplikací a administraci. Akce se koná v těchto městech: ✓ Brno (12.10. - 13.10.) - Fakulta inf. technologií (FIT), Vysoké učení technické v Brně ✓ Praha (02.11. - 03.11.) - Matematicko-fyzikální fakulta, Univerzita Karlova ✓ Ostrava (30.11. - 01.12.) - Vysoká škola báňská, Technická univerzita Ostrava Více informací o akci na www.ms-fest.cz. Aplikace MS Fest nabízí: ✓ Přehledný program konference ✓ Detailní informace ke každé přednášce ✓ Možnost označení oblíbených přednášek ✓ Přímé vložení informací o přednášce do kalendáře ✓ Praktické informace o konferenci Aplikaci vyvinula společnost eMan s.r.o., která je jedním z partnerů konference MS Fest 2013. The "MS Fest 2013 'is a practical guide for conference attendees MS Fest 2013. MS Fest is a traditional two-day weekend conference, which is organized by Microsoft Student Partners. The conference program features two full days of lectures on application development and administration. The event is held in the following cities: ✓ Brno (12.10 - 10.13) - Faculty inf. Technology (FIT), Brno University of Technology ✓ Praha (02.11 - 03.11) - Mathematics and Physics, Charles University ✓ Ostrava (30.11 - 12.01) - Technical University, Technical University of Ostrava More information about the event at www.ms-fest.cz. MS Fest offers: ✓ Overview Conference Program ✓ Detailed information on each lecture ✓ The option to Favorites lectures ✓ Direct insert information about the lecture to your calendar ✓ Practical information about the conference The application was developed by Eman Ltd., which is one of the partners of the conference MS Fest 2013.

description: With mobile application ČP INVEST you will have current information about your investments at hand right on your smartphone. This free service will allow you to simply monitor the various aspects related to your mutual funds. - Set up your own profile and have at hand the information only for certain selected funds that interest you - Monitor each selected fund prices and performance of mutual funds, including the development in the chart - Download and view the selected fund's factsheets with monthly summary information - Take a 14-day summary report on current development in capital markets by ČP INVEST’s Chief investment strategist - Set up fund prices notification. This settings let you see the application which displays a message about the fund's prices exceed the pre-set limits (the notification can also be set to daily changes and the whole history of the development can be seen on the chart) - Find basic assistance in the module "FAQ", where you have on hand bank accounts of the mutual funds and the payment information to identify - Direct dial to the info line

Generali Slovensko je inovatívnou a praktickou poisťovňou s dôrazom na kvalitný a rýchly servis pre klienta. Nová mobilná aplikácia Keby niečo Vám umožňuje rýchly a jednoduchý prístup k službám Generali Slovensko kdekoľvek a kedykoľvek budete potrebovať. Keby niečo, pomôže vám pri nahlásení poistnej udalosti priamo z miesta nehody. Hlavné výhody: - Nahlásenie dopravnej nehody - Sprievodca odporúčanými krokmi, čo robiť po dopravnej nehode - Interaktívna mapa všetkým zmluvných autoservisov na celom území Slovenskej republiky spolu s otváracou dobou, kontaktnými údajmi a GPS súradnicami. - Užívateľský profil pre efektívnu prácu so zadanými údajmi. --------------------------------------------------- Generali Slovakia is an innovative and practical insurance company which lays stress on quick customer service of high quality. New mobile application „Keby niečo“ enables you a quick and simple access to services of Generali Slovakia wherever and whenever you may need it. Keby niečo helps you to report an insurance event directly from the place of an accident. Main advantages: - Traffic accident reporting - Guide trough the recommended steps, desrcibing what to do after a traffic accident - Interactive map of all contractual car service stations, situated in the whole area of Slovak republic, together with opening hours, contact information and GPS coordinate finder - User profile for effective work with stated data
release_text: Od novej verzie aplikácie máte možnosť nahlásiť nehodu z havarijného poistenia. --------------------------------------------------- Since the new version you can report an accident of accident insurance.

description: Application mParkování is designed for all drivers who regurarly or occasionaly have to solve problems with parking and a high traffic density in Prague. With the application mParkování you are getting a tool which enables you to find a vacant parking place or to avoid annoying traffic jams. Features: ✓ Car parks P+R – information about current vacant places in all Prague´s car lots including some practical information about individual car lots. ✓ Cameras – current view of dozens Prague´s locations through photographs taken by traffic cameras. ✓ Traffic levels – information about the current traffic situation of many locations in Prague. ✓ Parking Zones – detailed maps of Parking Zones in Prague. All the informations are organized in a synoptic table, you can choose from many points of view. A view on a map is also available. For futher info see www.mparkovani.cz

Oficiální aplikace TEDxPrague je určena pro účastníky a příznivce setkání pořádaných pod hlavičkou TEDxPrague. Praktický nástroj přináší novinky a podrobné informace k jednotlivým akcím. Aplikace nabízí: ✔︎ Novinky ✔︎ Podrobné informace k akcím ✔︎ Program ✔︎ Profily řečníků ✔︎ Informace o místě konání (jak se dostat na místo autem nebo MHD), mapa, plánek budovy ✔︎ Kontakty na pořadatele ✔︎ Odkazy (web, sociální sítě) TEDx je celosvětová síť lokálně pořádaných setkání, jejichž hlavním principem jsou „myšlenky hodné šíření“ v duchu konference TED. Více informací na webu http://www.tedxprague.cz . eMan aplikaci vyvinul v rámci partnerství s organizátorem pražských setkání TEDxPrague. Official application TEDxPrague is intended for participants and supporters of the meetings held under the auspices of TEDxPrague. Practical tool provides news and detailed information on individual events. The application offers: ✔ ︎ News ✔ ︎ detailed information on events ✔ ︎ Program ✔ ︎ Speaker Profile ✔ ︎ Information about the place (how to get to by car or public transport), map, plan buildings ✔ ︎ Contact the organizer ✔ ︎ Links (web, social networks) TEDx is a global network of locally organized meetings whose main principle is "ideas worth spreading" in the spirit of TED conference. For more information on the Web http://www.tedxprague.cz . Eman application developed in partnership with the organizer of the Prague meeting TEDxPrague.

Simple but challenging real-time strategy game for two players at one Android device. Beat your mate in epic sky battle and bomb his base to ash. Training mode for one player is included if you miss a kick-ass-available friend. Tune nearly all game parameters from battleground size to items construction time according to your strategy desires. Because the whole battleground fits a single screen, playing on devices with less than 5 inch screen can be troublesome.

Useful application when you do not have at hand the dice. To prevent cheating, you can trace the history of dice rolls. Sound will be heard when throwing dice and you can also turn on the time between dice rolls. If you check in the settings 'Roll by gesture', then you can hide phone by your hands and you can easily play the game Mia ( known also as Mexican or Mexico )

A Stunning and unique brand new experience for your outdated, under dressed Go widget! Are you still using the ICS Gowidget skins we released last September? Or just using some knock-off generic brand imitation from the "other guys" that couldn't make their own unique look themselves? Because there is very little option out there for gowidget skins, and unless you got them from DCOMBL, they most likely look terrible. So with popular demand, we're back! This month we'll be releasing a handful of brand new, never before seen, unique style of Go Widget skins! Follow us on Twitter or friend us on Facebook and you will have an exclusive chance to not only see what we have coming out next, but also have a chance to win free stuff, and also give your opinion on new themes before we release them to the public! We love giving away free stuff and we love user input when it comes to designing new stuff! With that all said, Here are the details.. The following is included for your Golauncher Gowidgets : [+] Calender Widget Theme [+] Bookmark Widget Theme [+] Store Widget Theme [+] Email Widget Theme [+] Contacts Theme [+] The rest are in the paid version! [ ] Facebook Widget Theme [ ] Twitter Widget Theme [ ] SMS / MMS / Message Widget Theme [ ] Switch / Power widget Theme [ ] Task Manager Theme [ ] Tasks / Notes / Todo Widget Theme These widgets were designed to match the theme, style and look to the newest version of Google's amazing Android 4.1 Jellybean / 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich. In a few situations while using this widget theme, you might find a graphic that isn't changed after applying the theme - that is because we cant modify some parts of the GO! Widgets, and in the future when the art / graphic is able to be changed, we will for sure change it up! To match the rest of the style in our theme. Check our other themes, check our comments by our users, We constantly improve, make updates, and stay with the current times to guarantee that your theme wont go out of style! Please feel free to contact me, email, visit us on twitter or facebook for our super responsive support and friendly customer service and tech support. We're the best, and we can say that because we KNOW it.

description: Over 2000 one of a kind and unique style icon pack you cant find ANYWHERE else. These are very shiny, glass and glossy like icons, in full sized Hi-Def HD quality. They are big icons! If your launcher of choice allows changing of size, try it! Completely different look than our "ICS Plates" Theme. These icons are very glass like & reflective, with transparent trim. ★ FEATURES ★ - We have a one of a kind "Search" function - This theme contains over 2000 icons!! - They all theme from the drawer! - Can be applied as theme with almost all launchers - 6 Custom Wallpapers - 5 Glass and Glossy Docks - 4 Drawer Backgrounds + The Apps2SD feature is enabled, but is unadvised. ★ HOW TO USE ★ All the instructions are available if you click "OPEN" after download, its very important to follow them! ★ WORKS AS ★ - Go Launcher Theme - ADW Theme - Apex Theme - Nova Theme - Nemus Theme Icons work with: - TSF Shell - Rabbit Launcher - Panda Home - Atom Launcher - Holo Launcher - Launcher Pro - Crazy Home - dxTop Lite - Open Home - VTL Launcher - Circle Launcher - Desktop Visualizer DVR - Folder Organizer - MX Home - OpenHome 6 - Launcher-X ★ BETTER THAN ALL ★ Completely theme's all system icons on many devices, including: - Jellybean Android - Ice Cream Sandwich - AOSP - AOKP - Honeycomb - Gingerbread - Miui - TouchWiz - CyanogenMod - Sense 2.5 to Sense 4 - If were missing something, please email! ★ LIKE THIS? ★ Please check out our other matching apps! Search for “DCOMOBILE” in the market! We hope you enjoy!! Show us some <3 and leave comments! ★ EXTRA INFO ★ The clock in the screen shots is 'BobClockD3' (free) Pressing 'open' after downloading will only open our info screen. ★ Error with GOLauncher? ★ When you go to manually select an Icon in GO Launcher, to use our amazing organized and searchable index of icons, select the icon above the "reset" button when in the Go selection mode. If your Gallery app opens, you need to "clear defaults" for your gallery app. Using this method to select icons makes it much easier for Go Launcher to load the icons, and much easier to find the icons your looking for.

*** Exklusiv für ADAC-Mitglieder *** Ab sofort steht das ADAC TourSet für ADAC Mitglieder auch als kostenfreie App zur Verfügung. Mit dem ADAC TourSet bekommen Sie einen schnellen Online-Zugang zu allen 134 Urlaubsführern des gedruckten TourSets. Reisen in Europa, Nordamerika, Australien und Neuseeland wird damit noch flexibler und bequemer. Größter Vorteil der App: Nach dem Download eines TourSet-Titels (Größe zwischen 20 und ca. 100 MB) lassen sich alle TourSet-Inhalte offline nutzen. Sie brauchen also keine Internetverbindung und im Ausland fallen auch keine teuren Roaming-Kosten an. Jeder Urlaubsführer bietet neben zoombaren Karten und GPS-Funktionalitäten bewährte Informationen in ADAC Qualität. Dazu gehören wissenswerte Fakten und Details zum Reiseland und zur Region, die wichtigsten Sehenswürdigkeiten, die von Bildergalerien, Öffnungszeiten und Eintrittspreisen ergänzt sind, und die ADAC Vorteile in der jeweiligen Region oder Stadt. Hinweis Sie müssen für die Nutzung der App Mitglied des ADAC sein und sich auf der adac.de registrieren. Die Registrierung ist auch innerhalb der App möglich. *** Exclusively for ADAC members *** Effective immediately, the ADAC Tour-set for ADAC members stands also as free of charge app available. With the ADAC Tour-set you get a quick Online-access to all 134 holiday leaders of the printed tour sets. Travel in Europe, North America, Australia and New Zealand will so that even more flexible and more convenient. Largest advantage of the app: After the download of a Tour-set-title (size between 20 and approx 100 MB) themselves leave all Tour-set-contents use offline. So they do not need internet connection and in the incurred for use abroad also no expensive roaming-costs. Next to zoomable maps and GPS-functionalities Every holiday leader offers proven information in ADAC quality. These include know facts worth and Details add to travel Country and to the region, the most important sights, the are supplemented of images galleries, opening times and entrance prices, and the ADAC advantages in the respective region or city. Reference You must be for the use of the app Member of the ADAC and register on the adac.de. The registration is possible also within of the app.

Unsere erfolgreichste Bergsport-App ist ab sofort in aktualisierter Version für Android Smartphones erhältlich. Vollgepackt mit unzähligen Bergtouren, einem riesigen Pool mit topografischen Karten und vielen praktischen Tools, ist die ORTOVOX BERGTOUREN APP ein Muss für jeden Bergsportler in den Alpen. Die Grundlage der App bildet eine zoombare, topografische Outdoorkarte im Maßstab 1:25.000. Die Karte ist online oder offline verfügbar und wird für den Alpenraum, je nach Jahreszeit, schneebedeckt oder im Sommergewand dargestellt. In den obersten Zoomstufen beinhaltet sie neben dem amtlichen Wegenetz sogar sämtliche Lifte und Pisten und einen Hangneigungsindikator. Sämtliche Hangpartien über 30° Neigung sind mit einer roten Schraffierung versehen. Die Karten können, losgelöst von der Tourendatenbank, überall im deutschen, österreichischen und Südtiroler Alpenraum zur Positionsbestimmung und Tourennavigation eingesetzt werden. Da besonders im Gebirge die Mobilfunknetzabdeckung nicht immer ausreichend ist, können alle topografischen Karten auch offline gespeichert werden und funktionieren so völlig Netz unabhängig! Das Herzstück der ORTOVOX BERGTOUREN APP ist die große, immer weiter wachsende Tourendatendank. Du kannst tausende Ski-, Snowboard-, Wander-, Hoch- und Biketouren sowie Freerideabfahrten oder Klettersteige nach den unterschiedlichsten Kriterien auswählen: • Alphabetische Auflistung: Alle Touren werden in alphabetischer Reihenfolge angezeigt. • Auflistung nach Entfernung: Die Tourenliste wird nach der Entfernung zum eigenen Standort sortiert • Filterung nach Sportart: Alle Touren werden anhand verschiedener Kategorien angezeigt (Skitour, Schneeschuhtour, Freeride, Wandern, Hochtour, Klettersteig, MTB) • Suche nach Ort: Eine Volltextsuche innerhalb der Listendarstellung ermöglicht eine Filterung der Touren nach dem Kriterium Ort • Anforderung: Die Touren können nach Alphabet, Entfernung und Dauer der jeweiligen Tour sortiert werden Zu jeder Tour kannst Du auch die Anfahrt planen - die ORTOVOX BERGTOUREN APP schließt sich und die Google-Maps App zeigt Dir automatisch den Weg zum Startpunkt der Tour an. In den Tourenbeschreibungen erfährst Du alle wissenswerten Facts, kannst Bilder, das Höhenprofil und die Karte anschauen. Sobald Du eine Tour startest, siehst Du Dein Positionssignal in der topografischen Karte und folgst dem Routenverlauf. Bereits zuhause oder auch unterwegs kannst Du künftig Deine eigenen Touren planen. Zuhause kannst Du im Tourenplaner unter ortovox.com mit der Maus die Wegstrecken der 1:25.000 Karten abfahren, Wegpunkte setzen, Beschreibungen ergänzen und gegebenenfalls Bilder hochladen. Ähnliche Funktionen kannst Du auch in der App nutzen. Egal ob online oder offline, Du kannst in den topografischen Karten Wegpunkte setzen und Dir das Live-Höhenprofil der geplanten Tour anzeigen lassen. Auch für Notfälle haben wir eine Hilfestellung parat. Mittels Notruffunktion kann eine Verbindung zur Rettungsstelle hergestellt werden. Zur möglichst genauen Positionsbestimmung werden Dir Deine Koordinaten auf dem Display angezeigt – Retter wissen so, wo sie suchen müssen. Wer sich alles Wissenswerte zum Thema Lawine aneignen möchte, kann dies jederzeit offline mit dem umfangreichen Lawinenglossar von ORTOVOX machen. Hier erhältst Du alle Infos vom Grundlagenwissen über Risikomanagement bis hin zur Rettung. ORTOVOX steht für Bergsport - Berge sind unsere Leidenschaft. Wir sind 365 Tage im Jahr im Gebirge unterwegs, sammeln Ideen für neue Produkte oder genießen einfach nur unseren Sport! Solltest Du Ideen oder Verbesserungsvorschläge zur App oder unseren Produkten haben, freuen wir uns auf Deine Nachricht: info@ortovox.com Ein wichtiger Hinweis: 3G-Empfang wird empfohlen. Achtung: Im Ausland können hohe Roamingkosten entstehen. Bei Nutzung der App im Hintergrund bei aktiviertem GPS Empfang kann sich die Akkulaufzeit drastisch verkürzen! Our most successful mountain sports app is available in an updated version of Android smartphones from now on. Packed with countless mountain hikes, a huge pool with topographic maps and lots of practical tools that ORTOVOX MOUNTAIN TOURS app is a must for every mountaineer in the Alps. The basis of the app provides a zoomable, topographic outdoor map in scale 1: 25,000. The map is online or offline available and is presented for the Alpine region, depending on the season, snowy or summer dress. In the top zoom levels it includes not only the official network of paths even all lifts and slopes and slope indicator. All slope portions exceeding 30 ° inclination are provided with a red hatching. The cards can be detached from the tour database anywhere in the German, Austrian and South Tyrolean Alpine region are used for positioning and navigation tour. Since especially in the mountains, the mobile network coverage is not always sufficient, all topographic maps can be also stored offline and function as fully independent network! The heart of the ORTOVOX MOUNTAIN TOURS APP is the large, ever-expanding tour dates thanks. You can select thousands of ski, snowboard, hiking, bike tours, as well as high and freeriding or via ferrata according to different criteria: • Alphabetical Listing: All tours are displayed in alphabetical order. • List by distance: Tour list is sorted by the distance to the own location • Filtering by sport: All tours are based on various categories displayed (ski, snowshoe tour, freeride, hiking, alpine tours, Mountain Climbing, MTB) • Search by City: A full text search within the list view provides a filtering of routes based on the criterion location • Requirement: The tours can be sorted by alphabet, location and duration of each tour For each tour you can also plan the journey - the ORTOVOX MOUNTAIN TOURS APP closes and the Google Maps app automatically shows you the way to the start point of the tour. In the tour descriptions you can find out look all worth knowing facts, can images, the height profile and the map. Once you start a tour, you can see your position signal in the topographic map and follow the road ahead. Already at home or on the go you can continue your own tours planning. You can home in Tour Planner under ortovox.com with the mouse, the distances of the 1: 25,000 maps depart, set waypoints, add descriptions and optionally upload images. Similar functions you can use in the app. Whether online or offline, you can set waypoints and let you watch live-height profile of the planned tour in the topographic maps. For emergencies, we have a ready help. Using emergency function can be a connection to the emergency room. For giving an accurate position determination you are your coordinates on the display - so rescuers know where to look. Anyone who wants to learn everything you need to know on the subject of avalanche, it may at any time make offline with extensive avalanche Glossary of ORTOVOX. Here you will get all the info from the basic knowledge of risk management to the rescue. ORTOVOX stands for mountain sports - mountains are our passion. We are open 365 days a year traveling in the mountains, gather ideas for new products or simply enjoy our sport! If you have ideas or suggestions for the app or our products, we look forward to your message: info@ortovox.com An important note: 3G reception is recommended. Warning: Abroad high roaming charges may apply. By using the app in the background when enabled GPS receiver, the battery life can be drastically reduced!

description: Touren in Rheinland-Pfalz: Wandern und Radfahren in Eifel, Hunsrück, Westerwald, Rheinhessen und der Pfalz sowie an Rhein, Mosel, Nahe, Lahn und Ahr. Rheinland-Pfalz bietet Landschaften wie im Bilderbuch. Auf ausgesuchten Wanderwegen und Radtouren können Sie unsere Natur und Kultur erleben. Diese App bietet Tourenbeschreibungen, Fotos und Höhenprofile für: -zertifizierte Fernwanderwege, Kurztouren und Themenwege -Radfern- und themenwege, Mountainbiketrails und Rennradstrecken Alle Touren und die Karte können Sie selbstverständlich bequem zuhause offline speichern und benötigen somit kein Mobilfunknetz auf Ihrer Tour! Sie können auch eine eigene Tour aufzeichnen. In der App finden Sie auch Unterkünfte, Sehenswürdigkeiten und Einkehrmöglichkeiten entlang der Touren. Bei der Reiseplanung sind wir auch gerne behilflich unter info@gastlandschaften.de . Genießen Sie Ihre Touren - und passen Sie auf sich auf! Ein wichtiger Hinweis: Bei Nutzung der App im Hintergrund mit aktiviertem GPS-Empfang kann sich die Akkulaufzeit drastisch verkürzen. Tours in Rhineland-Palatinate:  Walking and cycling in the Eifel, Hunsrück, Westerwald, Rheinhessen and Pfalz and the Rhine, Mosel, Nahe, Lahn and Ahr. Rhineland-Palatinate offers landscapes like in the picture. On selected hiking trails and cycling you can experience our nature and culture. This app provides tour descriptions, photographs and altitude profiles for: -certified distance trails, short tours and themed trails -Radfern- And theme trails, mountain bike trails and bike routes All tours and the card you can save at home of course convenient offline and thus non-wireless on your tour! You can also record your own tour. In the app, you'll also find lodging, attractions and rest stops along the routes. With travel arrangements, we are also happy to help with info@gastlandschaften.de . Enjoy your trips - and watch out for yourself! An important note: If you use the app in the background with GPS reception is on, battery life may be drastically reduced.

description: Kleines Land mit großer Küche: Das Saarland ist bis weit über die Grenzen hinaus für seine kulinarischen Köstlichkeiten bekannt, und das zu Recht! Durch den starken französischen Einfluss hat sich hier eine ganz spezielle Küchenkultur entwickelt, die einzigartig im europäischen Raum ist. Ob Sternedekoriert oder gut Bürgerlich, im Saarland findet sich die ganze Palette kulinarischer Vielfalt. Ein Streifzug durch die saarländische Küche lässt sich wunderbar auch mit Wander- und Radtouren verbinden. Wandern & Genießen: Mehr als 50 Premiumwege warten über das ganze Land verteilt mit vielfältigsten Natureindrücken auf Sie. Highlight ist der Saar-Hunsrück-Steig mit seinen Traumschleifen, der den saarländischen Weinort Perl an der Mosel, die Römerstadt Trier und die Edelsteinmetropole Idar-Oberstein miteinander verbindet. Die Saarland Tafeltouren verführen zum Wandern und anschließenden Genießen in ausgewählten Restaurants. Radfahren im Saarland: Ob familiengerechte Strecken entlang der Flusstäler, schweißtreibende Anstiege in die Hunsrückhöhen oder grenzüberschreitende Touren nach Frankreich oder Luxemburg. Das Saarland punktet durch sein abwechslungsreiches Angebot für gemütliches Freizeitradeln, Mehrtagestouren und sportliche Herausforderungen. Ob Rundweg oder Streckennetz, die Fahrradrouten im Saarland sind immer gut beschildert und lassen Sie nie den Weg verlieren. Genießen Sie weite Felder, romantische Weinberge oder idyllische Flußlandschaften im SaarRadland. eVelo Saarland - einfach aufsteigen: mehr braucht es nicht um mühelos und mit hohem Spaßfaktor die Höhenzüge des Saarlandes zu erklimmen. Sie treten in die Pedale und der lautlose Elektromotor unserer Leihräder unterstützt ihre eigene Muskelkraft bis zu 150%. Die Reichweite beträgt je nach Beschaffenheit der Strecke bis zu 50 km mit einer Akkuladung. Für die Einen ist es einfach eine genussvolle Art Rad zu fahren, für Andere ermöglicht die Kraftunterstützung des Rades Touren mit Partner, Familie und Freunden, die mit dem „normalen“ Rad nicht möglich wären. Verleihstationen für unsere E-Bikes finden Sie in vielen Regionen des Saarlandes. Small country with a large kitchen: Saarland is known for its culinary delights far beyond its borders, and rightly so! Due to the strong French influence here a very special culinary culture has developed that is unique in Europe. Whether stars or well decorated Civic, Saarland there is a whole range of culinary diversity. A journey through the Saarland cuisine can be wonderfully combined with hiking and biking. Hiking and Enjoy: More than 50 premium channels distributed over the country wait with varied impressions of nature to you. The highlight is the Saar-Hunsrück Climb with his dream loops connecting the Saarland Perl on the Moselle wine town, the Roman city of Trier and the gemstone capital Idar-Oberstein each other. The Saarland panel for hiking tours seduce and subsequent Enjoy in selected restaurants. Cycling in Saarland: Whether family-friendly routes along the river valleys, sweaty climbs to the heights of the Hunsrück or cross-border tours to France and Luxembourg. The Saarland scores with its varied range of comfortable leisure cycling, multi-day trips and sporting challenges. Whether trail or route network, the bicycle routes in the Saarland are always well signposted and you can never lose your way. Enjoy open fields, vineyards, romantic or idyllic river landscapes in SaarRadland. eVelo Saarland - simply ascend: all it takes to easily and with a high fun factor to scale the hills of the Saarland. You step on the pedals and the silent electric motor supports our bikes their own muscle power up to 150%. The range is depending on the nature of the road up to 50 km on a single charge. For some, it's simply an enjoyable way to ride a bike, for others enables the supporting force of the wheel tours with partners, family and friends who would not be possible with a "normal" bike. Rental stations for our electric bikes can be found in many regions of the Saarland.

description: Durch den Schwarzwald wandern und den Bodensee erleben, in Baden-Baden entspannen und in Heidelberg die Kultur genießen: Es gibt mehr als einen Grund, nach Baden-Württemberg zu reisen. In das Land mit den meisten Gastronomiesternen - und den meisten Sonnenstunden. Im Süden! Ein lauer Sommerabend auf einem Schloss, eine Terrasse über den Weinbergen, eine Aussicht, die den Blick für die schönen Dinge des Lebens wieder frei macht. Herrliche Genießerlandschaften gibt es viele in Baden-Württemberg: Ob man auf den Hügeln des Kaiserstuhls einen Grauburgunder trinkt, in einem Landgasthof am Bodensee ein fangfrisches Felchen bestellt oder in den Tälern des Schwarzwalds im Feinschmeckerrestaurant speist.Am besten erlebt man den Urlaub mit allen Sinnen. Über die Blumeninsel Mainau spazieren und die Blütendüfte die Nase kitzeln lassen. Am Bodensee entlang radeln und übers Wasser bis in die Schweizer Berge blicken. Die Höhlen der Schwäbischen Alb erforschen und die feuchte Luft spüren. In den Kurorten, Thermen und Wellnesshotels kann man abtauchen, entspannen, die Heilkraft der Natur erleben.Von Friedrich Schiller bis Hermann Hesse prägten viele Dichter und Denker das Land. Wer heute ihre Spuren sucht, findet Großstädte mit moderner Architektur ebenso wie Fachwerkhäuschen in gemütlichen Dörfern. Burgen, Schlösser und Gärten erzählen von früheren Zeiten, ebenso viele Museen - darunter auch die von Daimler und Porsche in Stuttgart. Baden-Württemberg ist die Wiege des Automobils. Und die Heimat zahlreicher anderer Besonderheiten, die heute weltbekannt sind. Die Kuckucksuhr beispielsweise. Die Anzüge von Boss. Der Schwarzwälder Schinken. Zwischen Heidelberg und dem Bodensee, Karlsruhe und Ulm kann man sie kaufen, im Museum erleben – oder auf dem Teller genießen. Willkommen im Süden! Wandern: In Baden-Württemberg erwartet Sie ein Wanderwegenetz, das keine Wünsche offen lässt. Wandern Sie entlang beeindruckender Schluchten, vorbei an Wasserfällen oder zu einem der zahlreichen Schlösser oder Burgen – das Wander-Paradies im Süden ist facettenreich. Bei gemütlichen Tagestourenoder auf Fernwanderwegen, wie dem berühmten Westweg, warten atemberaubende Ausblicke, wunderschöne Hügellandschaften und glasklare Bergluft auf Sie. Überall unterwegs vom Taubertal bis zum Bodensee finden Sie gemütliche Wanderhütten, lokale Speisen, beste Weine und die Herzlichkeit des Südens. Radfahren: Radfahren in Baden-Württemberg – das heißt auf weitreichenden Wegenetzen über die Schwäbische Alb oder durch den Schwarzwald Berge hinauf und wieder hinab radeln, entlang des Bodensees, der Donau oder des Neckars fahren – alleine, mit der Familie, sportlich oder gemütlich. Besondere Highlights dieser App: •grundlegende Charakteristika (Länge, Dauer, Höhenmeter, Schwierigkeit) •Anreise-/Parkmöglichkeiten •Sehenswertes entlang der Strecke mit Informationen und Bildern •ausführliche Wegbeschreibung mit Hinweisen auf Rast- und Einkehrmöglichkeiten, Wegebeschaffenheit, Besonderheiten •Höhenprofil etc. Ein besonderes Highlight der App ist die zugrunde liegende topographische Karte. Diese enhält Karte das gesamte, amtlich erfasste Wegenetz und ist bis zu einem Maßstab von 1:25.000 zoombar. Als besonderes Highlight ist es möglich Touren,Punkte und Karte OFFLINE zu speichern Hike through the Black Forest and Lake Constance experience, relax in Baden-Baden, Heidelberg and enjoy the culture: There is more than one reason to travel to Baden-Württemberg. In the country with the most stars gastronomy - and the most sunshine hours. In the south! A warm summer evening in a castle, a terrace overlooking the vineyards, a prospect that makes the eye for the finer things in life free again. Gorgeous gourmet landscapes there are many in Baden-Württemberg: Whether a Pinot Gris to drink on the hills of the emperor chair, appointed in a country inn on Lake Constance a catch fresh whitefish or in the valleys of the Black Forest in the gourmet restaurant speist.Am best way to experience the holidays with all your senses. Walk on the flower island of Mainau and let the floral scents tickle the nose. Lake Constance cycle along and look out over the water to the Swiss mountains. Explore the caves of the Swabian Alb and feel the moist air. In the resorts, spas and wellness hotels you can dive, relax, the healing power of nature erleben.Von Friedrich Schiller to Hermann Hesse influenced many poets and thinkers of the country. Those looking for traces today, will big cities with modern architecture as well as half-timbered house in cozy villages. Castles, palaces and gardens tell of earlier times, as many museums - including the Daimler and Porsche in Stuttgart. Baden-Württemberg is the birthplace of the automobile. And home to many other features that are now world famous. The cuckoo clock for example. The suits from Boss. The Black Forest ham. Between Heidelberg and Lake Constance, Karlsruhe and Ulm you can buy them, experience in the museum - or enjoy on the plate. Welcome to the South! Hiking: In Baden-Württemberg offers a trail system that leaves nothing to be desired. Walk along stunning gorges, past waterfalls or to one of the many castles or fortresses - the hiking paradise in the South is multifaceted. With cozy day tour or on long-distance paths such as the famous western route, wait breathtaking views, beautiful hills and crystal-clear mountain air on you. Anywhere you go from the Tauber Valley to Lake Constance you will find cozy cabins, local food, the finest wines and the warmth of the South. Cycling: Cycling in Baden-Württemberg - that is, to extensive road systems over the Swabian Alb and the Black Forest mountains up and ride back down, drive along the Lake Constance, the Danube and the Neckar - alone, with family, sporty or comfortable. Special highlights of this app: • basic characteristics (length, duration, altitude, difficulty) • Anreise-/Parkmöglichkeiten • Places of interest along the route with information and pictures • Detailed directions with instructions to rest and refreshment options, paths texture features • Altitude profile, etc. A special highlight of the app is the underlying topographic map. This card contains the entire road network and is officially recognized up to a scale of 1:25,000 zoomable. As a special highlight, it is possible to store tours, points card OFFLINE

Traumpfade – Rundwanderwege im Premiumformat 26 wunderschöne Traumpfade und der Themenweg Streuobstwiesenweg warten im Rhein-Mosel-Eifel-Land darauf, von Ihnen entdeckt zu werden. Schnüren Sie Ihre Wanderstiefel und genießen Sie die abwechslungsreichen Tages- oder Halbtagestouren. Auf naturbelassenen Wegen geht es vorbei an wildromantischen Burgen, beeindruckenden Schluchten, gurgelnden Bachtälern und fantastischen Aussichtspunkten in das Rhein- und Moseltal und die vulkanische Osteifel. Mit unserem digitalen Stempelheft „Traumpfade-Star“ können Sie die Traumpfade virtuell sammeln und jedes Jahr ein attraktives Wanderwochenende gewinnen! Die Traumpfade-App bietet alle Informationen rund um die Rundwanderwege: • Key-Facts: Länge, Höhenmeter, Dauer und Schwierigkeitsgrad der Traumpfade • Tourenbeschreibungen, Karten und Fotos der Traumpfade • Übernachtungs- und Einkehrmöglichkeiten entlang der Traumpfade • Sehenswürdigkeiten entlang der Traumpfade (auch direkt im „Live-Stream“) • Über das Tool „Wegezustand melden“ können Sie uns direkt Störungen am Weg mitteilen • Über den „Gipfelfinder“ können Sie sich im „Live-Stream“ unsere Vulkane und andere Erhebungen anzeigen lassen Wir wünschen Ihnen viel Spaß beim Erwandern der Traumpfade! Herzlich willkommen im Rhein-Mosel-Eifel-Land Songlines - hiking trails in the premium format 26 beautiful Songlines and the theme orchard meadow wait in the Rhein-Mosel-Eifel-country waiting to be discovered by you. Lace up your hiking boots and enjoy the varied day or half-day tours. On natural trails will take you past the wild, romantic castles, impressive gorges, gurgling stream valleys and fantastic vantage points in the Rhine and Mosel Valley and the East Eifel volcanic. With our digital stamp booklet "The Songlines Star", you can collect the Songlines virtually and win an attractive hiking weekend every year! The Songlines app provides all the information about the hiking trails: • Key Facts: length, altitude, length and difficulty of the Songlines • tour descriptions, maps, and photos of the Songlines • accommodation and rest stops along the Songlines • Sights along the Songlines (directly in the "Live Stream") • "Report trail conditions" About the tool you can report directly disturbances on the way • About the "summit Finder" you can relax in the "live stream" view our volcanoes and other surveys We hope you enjoy Hike the Songlines! Welcome to the Rhein-Mosel-Eifel region

Wandertouren-App Hessen: Touren, Unterkünfte, Einkehr Egal ob von nah oder fern – durch seine zentrale Lage in der Mitte Deutschlands ist Hessen für alle Wanderer gut zu erreichen. Herrliche Waldgebirge und ein gut ausgebautes Wegenetz mit über 2.400 Kilometern qualitätsgeprüften Wanderwegen sind beste Voraussetzungen für unvergessliche Wandererlebnisse. Egal, ob Kurztrip oder Mehrtagesvergnügen. Die Wandertouren-App Hessen bietet Ihnen Informationen zu den hessischen Prädikatswegen sowie einigen Kultur- und Pilgerwegen inklusive Wegebeschreibung, Höhenprofil, Bildern zum Weg und Angaben zu Länge, Schwierigkeit und Dauer. Die topographische Karte verzeichnet jede Tour im Maßstab 1:25.000. Mit der nützlichen Offline-Speicherung können Sie sich die Touren außerdem bereits bequem zuhause auf ihr Smartphone laden und ohne Internetzugang unterwegs abrufen. Sollten Sie während Ihrer Wanderung Mängel am Weg oder der Wegebeschilderung feststellen, können Sie uns dies ganz bequem über die Mängelmeldefunktion mitteilen. Wir werden uns dann schnellstmöglich um die Behebung des Mangels kümmern. Sie möchten auf Ihrer Tour einkehren oder suchen eine wanderfreundliche Unterkunft? Kein Problem, denn die Wandertouren-App Hessen stellt Ihnen auch hier nützliche Informationen zu wanderfreundlichen Gastgebern, sterneklassifizierten Hotels, Campingplätzen, Jugendherbergen, Urlaub auf dem Bauernhof und Hessen à la carte Betrieben zur Verfügung. Kontakt: HA Hessen Agentur GmbH Tourismus- und Kongressmarketing Konradinerallee 9 65189 Wiesbaden info@hessen-tourismus.de www.hessen-tourismus.de Walking tours App Hesse: tours, accommodation, retreats Whether near or far - with its central location in the heart of Germany's Hesse easily accessible for all hikers. Gorgeous wooded mountains and a well-developed road network with over 2,400 kilometers of quality-controlled trails are the best conditions for unforgettable hiking experiences. Be it a short trip or multi-day pleasure. The walking tours app Hesse offers information on the Hessian predicate paths as well as some cultural and pilgrim routes, including routes description, altitude profile, images and information on the path length, difficulty and duration. The topographic map lists every tour at a scale of 1:25,000. A useful offline storage also you can download already comfortably at home on their smartphone and get on the road with no Internet access to the tours. If you suspect damage to your hike path, or paths, signage, you can report it easily accessible from the defects signaling function. We will then take care of as quickly as possible to remedy the defect. You want to stop off on your tour or looking for a walker-friendly accommodation? No problem, because the walking tours app Hesse also provides you with useful information here to wander friendly hosts, sterneklassifizierten hotels, campsites, hostels, farm holidays Hesse and à la carte has been established. Contact: HA Hessen Agentur GmbH Tourism and convention marketing Konradinerallee 9 65189 Wiesbaden info@hessen-tourismus.de www.hessen-tourismus.de

Get the app from Europe’s largest outdoor platform and be well prepared for your next adventure in the nature! 65,000 summer – and winter tours have been equipped primarily with edited descriptions, topographic maps, elevation profiles, tour data, photos and GPX tracks, are all accessible by mobile devices and can be commented and rated. Maps: outdooractive.com provides you with topographic maps of all the German-speaking regions. Superb OSM maps with hiking and bike trails, as well as maps in winter style, are made available to you worldwide, on which you can also view the slopes, slope gradient, lifts, winter hiking trails and sledding slopes. Tour planner: Plan tours in great detail on winter- and summer maps throughout Europe, and particularly in Germany, with bike- and hiking trail overlays, as well as the automatic display of elevation, kilometers and an elevation profile included. Current conditions: You can easily enter current conditions from underway via the outdooractive-App. Either you determine the position on our map or you simply enter the current condition directly for a tour – including pictures, weather, hazard note and description. Communtiy: You can edit your online profile via the app, upload a profile picture, add favorite activities or own qualifications. If you don’t have an outdooractive.com-Account, you can register via the app. Track recording: Record your tracks and obtain important data, such as kilometers, average speed, elevation, elevation profile and the time elapsed. Import a GPX track and use it as a template or export your recorded tour as a GPX file. Tour scanner: You will find a QR code for each tour in our outdooractive.com portal. After scanning it you will be directed to the mobile version of the tour. Additional features: • Altimeter. • Compass. • Inclinometer, with live view. • Emergency Service. • Import of GPX files via email, Dropbox or direct download. • Favorites feature. • Share content with friends. • Fullscreen mode. • Orient maps to display viewing direction. Warning: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
release_text: Thank you for your feedback! - Memos are now synchronized with the web (Hint: selfplanned and recorded tracks are not yet synched!) - Improvements for the Search within Regions - You can now use coordinates within the tourplanning-module - You can now download GPX-files for the tours and trails - Preview of tourcount within the regionselector - More countries within the regionselector - Usability improvements

description: Get the app from Europe’s largest outdoor platform and be well prepared for your next adventure in the nature! 65,000 summer – and winter tours have been equipped primarily with edited descriptions, topographic maps, elevation profiles, tour data, photos and GPX tracks, are all accessible by mobile devices and can be commented and rated. Save offline: All tours, including their topographic summer- and winter maps, are made readily available for downloading. In addition you can also access them in offline mode, which is ideal when on holiday in foreign countries or areas with weak or no network coverage. You can choose whether the data is saved directly on the smartphone or on an additional memory card. (Map only) Tour planner: Plan tours in great detail on winter- and summer maps throughout Europe, and particularly in Germany, with bike- and hiking trail overlays, as well as the automatic display of elevation, kilometers and an elevation profile included. Track recording: Record your tracks and obtain important data, such as kilometers, average speed, elevation, elevation profile and the time elapsed. Current conditions: You can easily enter current conditions from underway via the outdooractive-App. Either you determine the position on our map or you simply enter the current condition directly for a tour or a hut – including pictures, weather, hazard note and description. Ski Resorts: Our app has a comprehensive database of all the ski resorts. Get information on the weather, open lifts and slopes, snow depths and interesting facts about the ski resorts. This includes all regions of Germany, France, Austria, Switzerland and Liechtenstein. Tour scanner: You will find a QR code for each tour in our outdooractive.com portal. After scanning it you will be directed to the mobile version of the tour. Peak finder: The mountains are calling out to you! Thanks to the interactive 360 degree live panorama, you will always instantly know where to find which peak in your surroundings. (Also available offline) Communtiy: You can edit your online profile via the app, upload a profile picture, add favorite activities or own qualifications. If you don’t have an outdooractive.com-Account, you can register via the app. Additional features: •Altimeter. •Compass. •Favorites feature. •Share content with friends. •Fullscreen mode. •Orient maps to display viewing direction. release_text: - Create, rename and delete own Memo-Lists - Synchronisation of Memo-Lists (Note: local recorded tracks and planned tours are NOT yet synchronized with the web) - Avalanche Bulletins for winter-activities - You can now insert coordinates while using the tour-planning module - Download GPX-files - Usability improvements - Acceleration of the map download

Grades. Mobile. Easy. TAPUCATE is a professional app for teachers to help them manage all the information of their classes, students, grades, … Easily keep track of grades, exams, assignments, attendance,… of your students! TAPUCATE is intuitive to use and widely customizable! You quickly get comprehensive and clear information about the performance, progress and behavior of your students. "TAPUCATE - Teacher App" is the best choice for SMARTPHONES with Android >= 4.0 and is also optimized for 10" devices, but most of the optimizations are also available on 7" devices. New Android-Functions like the ActionBar or Hardware-Acceleration are supported on all devices (depending on the technical equipment of the device!). >>> IMPORTANT: During the development of TAPUCATE we spend a lot of time to integrate security measures for protecting your data and the data of your students! Please read our detailed explanation of „Data protection / Data security“ on our Website: http://www.apenschi.com/?page_id=1956 You can find detailed information on the many flexible features and also a comprehensive handbook on our website: http://www.apenschi.com/ Here are only briefly the main features: ... The database can be excanged between all TAPUCATE versions! DISPLAY / EDIT OF ... ------------------- ... Classes / courses, students with their pictures, with direct indication of the average grades for each subject and category ... Student records (eg absences) and class entries (eg, homework, lesson content) ... Reminders, checklists, notes, age/birthdays NUMEROUS SETTING OPTIONS ------------------- ... Grading categories / subcategories ... Grading schemes / Grading with decimal values ... Grouping, rounding behavior EFFECTIVE, FAST HANDLING BY USING ------------------- ... Serial inputs ... Seating plan (Extension-App "EP1") ... Data import of student data from the PC ... Data export for further processing on the PC ... Several PDF exports and PDF screenshots ... Use custom periods (eg half-year, quarter-year, semester, trimester, …) ... Change views using several "wipe" gestures ... Extensive help within AndroClass, and also on our website in a detailed Handbook SECURITY ------------------- ... Automatic and manual data backup and security backup (always fully encrypted and password protected!) ... Encryption of personal data inside the database ... Password protection for access to TAPUCATE ... Doesn't connect to the internet ... also no other automatic communication to the outside ... AndroClass requests as good as no permissions >>> PLEASE NOTE: We can't respond to comments or ratings published here. We can only provide support if you contact us directly. So, please, before writing angry comments please send us an eMail. Often problems are only a misunderstanding. Usually we reply within 24 hours! Thank you! >>> Please note that TAPUCATE is made to run on Android-Devices! We can't guarantee TAPUCATE to work on non-native Android devices like PCs on which an Android-System runs inside a virtual machine (e.g. App-Players)!
release_text: I appreciate your support helping to spread and improve TAPUCATE. Should you have any issue, then before you rate TAPUCATE below 5 stars, please kindly mail me at info@apenschi.de to give me an opportunity to provide you with assistance in resolving your issue!

description: Mit Horriwo erfassen Sie Ihre Daten zu Ansitz, Anblick und Abschuss mit wenigen Fingertipps und erstellen so ein Jagdtagebuch. Mit einem weiteren Fingertipp informieren Sie Ihre Revierkollegen mit einer SMS, um die Aktivitäten im Revier zu koordinieren. Weitere Vorteile: - Notfall-SMS mit GPS-Daten - Anlegen Ihrer Mitjäger bequem aus Ihrem Telefonbuch - Anzeige der Sitze in Karten- und Satellitendarstellung - Anzeige der Auf- und Untergangzeiten von Sonne und Mond für Ihr Revier - Excel-Export der Daten für Ansitz, Anblick und Abschuss mit allen Speicher- Sortier- und Filterfunktionen. Weitere Informationen, z.B. Wildbreterlös, können in Excel individuell zusätzlich erfasst werden. - Wichtige Jagdsignale als MP3 mit einem Fingertipp abspielbar Funktionsweise: Speichern Sie die Sitze Ihres Reviers mit GPS-Daten und Informationen zur Art des Sitzes. Die Revierdaten können bequem auf andere App-Inhaber kopiert werden. Wenn Sie einen Ansitz planen, Anblick haben oder ein Stück erlegen konnten, informieren Sie mit Horriwo auf bequeme Weise Ihre Mitjäger. Der Versand erfolgt per SMS, alle Informationen sind mit einigen Fingertipps erstellt und können später bequem nachgelesen und über Excel ausgewertet werden. Verzichten Sie auf den SMS-Versand, werden die Daten gleichwohl gespeichert, so dass Sie auf einfache Weise ein Jagdtagebuch führen. In Excel können Sie später beliebige Informationen ergänzen und nach allen Kriterien auswerten. Datenscbutz: •für die Nutzung von Horriwo ist keine Anmeldung erforderlich •es werden keine Nutzerdaten an Dritte übermittelt •es werden keine Daten zu den von Ihnen gespeicherten oder übermittelten Inhalten erfasst oder weitergegeben •Die App finanziert sich nur über den Verkaufspreis Aus Vertrauen: Vom Jäger für Jäger With Horriwo enter all data on stand hunting, sight and kill with just a few taps, and so create a hunting diary. With another tap inform your district colleagues by sending an SMS to coordinate the activities in the area. Other advantages: - Emergency SMS with GPS data - Create your fellow hunter from the comfort of your phone book - Display of seats in maps and satellite presentation - Display of the rise and set times of the sun and moon for your area - Excel export the data for stand hunting, sight and kill with all storage sorting and filtering functions. For more information, for example, Game proceeds could be entered individually in addition to Excel. - Important Jagdsignale playable as MP3 with a tap How it works: Save the seats of your coalfield with GPS data and information on the type of the seat. The area data can be easily copied to other app owners. If you are planning a raised hide, have sight or could impose a piece, please contact with Horriwo convenient way your fellow hunter. Shipping is via SMS, all information is created with some finger tips and can easily be looked up later and analyzed by Excel. Do not use SMS transmission, the data are nevertheless stored so that you easily perform a hunting diary. In Excel, you can later add any information and evaluate according to all criteria. Datenscbutz: • for the use of Horriwo Registration is not required • there is no user data to third parties is transmitted • it does not collect or forwarded to the content stored or transmitted by you • The app is financed only on the sale price From trust: From the hunters for hunters

description: ✔ Offline database ✔ Airports ✔ Aircrafts ✔ Country Codes ✔ Airlines ✔ METAR Codes ✔ NOTAM Q ✔ Aviation Abbreviations ✔ Delay Codes ✔ Send suggestions via email! FlightCode lists ICAO, IATA, FAA and Transport Canada (TC) Codes for airports, aircraft types and airlines. It also lists the country codes/registration informations of an aircraft and comes with a list of aviation abbreviations. You'll find an integrated maps view for many of the listed airports along with weather information. Aircraft types contain related wikipedia information that you can send out to your friends if you like. In addition, you can mark everything you've seen or even write your own notes (spotting function). Stay in touch with the developer by using the direct feedback and bring in your ideas to make this application better and better. Nice photographs draw a better picture of the topic. Enjoy flying and enjoy FlightCode! --------------- For passengers: Do you want to know where that nicely colored planes comes from? Look at the country codes of FlightCode. If you're on your route and want to have a look where the fuel stop is, but you just have shortcuts on your tickets? Look at the IATA airport codes in FlightCode. Do you like to know what the shortcuts on your luggage labels tell you? Look it up - even when you're running FlightCode offline the database part will work. --------------- For Pros: Do you have IATA Codes on your flight schedule and want to know what the new destination on that plan is? You got smaller airports on your route, on the left and on the right. And you don't want to consult the manual? The offline database of FlightCode can help. You recognize a callsign like "Yellow Flyer" in an aircraft radio call. Look up the ICAO Callsigns with FlightCode to know what Airline this is... Your working with METAR or NOTAM Q codes every day? FlightCode could be a nice thing to have then...

Daher Anmerkungen, Verbesserungsvorschläge und Fehlermeldungen per E-Mail an support@carlsen.de , damit wir schnell antworten können. Allgemeine Bewertungen gerne direkt unter „Rezensionen“ posten. Vielen Dank! Over 12 million Pixi every year! great reading and listening many funny animations illustrative Sounds Reading text to show and hide Images Puzzle Pixi Hobby Tip! Pixi App Bonus: an extra soundtrack to the children and adults can record your own story! Optimized for smartphones. Mia is excited. In kindergarten, they made a trip to the library and get paid all a bag with a book, a reading starter set. She looks at once with her bunny Hoppel on. It rings the doorbell - Yippi, their friends Mehmet and Leyla are there now can begin the adventure! Special Edition in the framework of the "read-start - Three milestones for reading." Further information at www.lesestart.de We are interested in improving Apps continuously. Therefore, comments, suggestions and bug reports via email to support@carlsen.de , so we can respond quickly. General Reviews welcome to post directly under "Reviews". Many Thanks!

Simple app for smokers of electric cigarettes that enables tracking of cost savings as well as purchases. Also shows date of break-even. Features: - Shows statistics of cost savings - Management of purchases and sales - Homescreen widget (see below) - Liquid mixing calculator and management of recipes list Widget explanation: The first line shows the number of real cigarettes that would have been smoked. The second line shows the effective cost savings. The third line shows the total costs of all purchases. Should you find a bug, please don't rate the app down. Just drop me an e-mail instead. Network permissions are required to display ads only.
release_text: Changes made in this version: - Fixed a bug that caused the action bar menu button to be hidden on Android versions >= 3.0. Should you find a bug, please don't rate the app down. Just drop me an e-mail instead.

description: Regenradar Bonn zeigt aktuelle Niederschläge im Großraum Bonn an (Umkreis max. 100 KM). Die Darstellung erfolgt in Form von animierten Radarbildern, die die Entwicklung der Niederschläge jeweils über den Zeitraum der letzten 60 Minuten visualisieren. Dabei sind verschiedene Darstellungsformen (Momente) der Niederschlagsschätzung auswählbar. Die dargestellten Radarbilder stammen von der Webseite des Metereologischen Institus der Universität Bonn und des Forschungszentrums Jülich ( http://www.meteo.uni-bonn.de/messdaten/radarbilder ). Da es sich dabei um einen freiwilligen Service handelt, kann leider keine permanente Verfügbarkeit des Dienstes garantiert werden. Die Zeitangaben auf dem Radarbild sind UTC, für Bonn müssen daher zwei Stunden dazugerechnet werden. Weitere Informationen zum Radar und zur Interpretation der Radarbilder: http://www.meteo.uni-bonn.de/messdaten/radarbilder/informationen-zum-radar Der Quellcode der App ist hier verfügbar: https://bitbucket.org/boden/regenradarbonn Weather radar shows current rainfall Bonn in Bonn area at (radius max. 100 KM). The representation is in the form of animated radar images that visualize the evolution of rainfall respectively over the period of the last 60 minutes. Various forms of representation (moments) of rainfall estimation can be selected. The radar images shown are from the website of meteorological Institus the University of Bonn and the Research Centre Jülich ( http://www.meteo.uni-bonn.de/messdaten/radarbilder ). Since this is a voluntary service, unfortunately, no permanent service availability can not be guaranteed. The time data on the radar screen are UTC Bonn therefore have two hours included as well. For more information on radar and interpretation of radar images: http://www.meteo.uni-bonn.de/messdaten/radarbilder/informationen-zum-radar The source code of the app is available here: https://bitbucket.org/boden/regenradarbonn

description: Create your shopping list easily - by voice input or keyboard! Even easier in this pro version. With "Shopping List Voice Input PRO" - you can hange the font size of your items and leave your reading glasses at home - you get a bunch of good karma ;) - you get more button background colors including transparent - there are no more of these annoying "get the pro version" ads. Well, no ads at all - you get all the feature of the free version as well You won't forget anything during your shopping spree. Tiny, but fast, easy-to-use and stable shopping list app without any needless features. FREE features: - add new items with one click easily (by speech recognition or by keyboard) - send your list to anyone by whatsapp, facebook messenger, skype or good old email ;) - deactivate items with just one click again(so you can re-use them later) - correct or change your item names - your shopping list is always with you and the shopping cart is always full - forget pen and paper, you do not need them anymore for your shopping list - various configuration options - can be used as a to-do list as well - localized in English, Spanish and German And last but not least: "Shopping List - Voice InputPRO" is used by me, its developer. Permissions: The only permission required is internet access for performing the voice input For question on this app or bug reports just email me: myapps@cgraf.de

Attach contacts to your emails just like any other file. Have you ever started to write an email and then realized that you want to attach the contact information of someone in your People (contacts) app? Only to then find out that the "attach" button in your email client won't offer you to select a contact. Okay, now… • close the draft • exit the email app • open the People app • open a contact • press "Share" • select the email app • and type the text again Too complicated? I agree! That's why I made this little app to allow you to attach contacts directly from the email app. • While composing an email, select the "attach" action. • When asked what type of attachment you want to add, select "Attach a contact". • Finally, select the contact whose information you want to attach in the VCARD (.vcf) file format. Works with… • Gmail • Email • K-9 Mail • Kaiten Mail • MailDroid • … and most likely every other email app. If this app doesn't work for you, please drop me a line using the "email developer" link in the Play store.

Student App München is the perfect App for students in Munich. It shows you the menu of the Mensa, live departure times of MVV trains and buses, information about current events, job offers, location plans, helpful links and rss feeds. The Student App München is perfect for every student at any college or university in or close to Munich (e.g. Technische Universität München (TUM), Ludwig Maximilians Universität München (LMU), Hochschule München (HM), Hochschule für Fernsehen und Film (HFF), Hochschule Fresenius, Hochschule für Musik und Theater, Macromedia Hochschule für Medien und Kommunikation, Universität der Bundeswehr München Neubiberg, FOM Hochschule für Ökonomie & Management, Akademie der Bildenden Künste München, AMD Akademie Mode & Design and many more). Supports the following Mensas and Cafeterias: - Mensa Arcisstraße, Munich - Mensa Garching, Garching - Mensa Leopoldstraße, Munich - Mensa Lothstraße, Munich - Mensa Martinsried, Planegg-Martinsried - Mensa Pasing, Munich - Mensa Weihenstephan, Freising - Mensaria Großhadern, Munich - Mensaria Schellingstraße, Munich - Stu-Cafe Adalbertstraße, Munich - Stu-Cafe Akademie, Freising - Stu-Cafe Boltzmannstraße, Garching - Stu-Cafe Karlstraße, Munich - Stu-Cafe Mensa Garching, Garching - Stu-Cafe Mensa-WST, Freising - StuBistro Mensa Rosenheim, Rosenheim Great information for every day life as a student: - Menu of the Mensas of Studentenwerk München - Live departures of S Bahn, U Bahn, Tram and Bus (MVV and MVG) - Information about events - Job offers - Location plans (MVV and MVG, campus plans) - Links - RSS Feeds Student App München is a must have for every student in Munich.

description: Entdecke die Schönheiten Ostfrieslands und der ostfriesischen Inseln mit der neuen kostenlosen Reiseführer App von Das Örtliche. Die App bietet in gewohnt hoher Qualität umfangreiche Informationen zu Sehenswürdigkeiten, Stränden, Restaurants, Freizeitaktivitäten, Veranstaltungen, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und Unterkünften. Du findest in der App neben allen Fährzeiten zu den Inseln Borkum, Juist, Norderney, Langeoog, Spiekeroog, Wangerooge und Baltrum auch Rad- und Wattwanderwege, einen Gezeitenkalender, die aktuellen Wettervorhersagen und die Webcams der Region. Du möchtest im Urlaub etwas für Deine Fitness tun? In der Ostfriesland App wirst Du vielfältige Sport- und Wassersportangebote finden. Mit der Reiseführer App von Das Örtliche hast Du also alle nötigen Infos rund um die ostfriesischen Inseln der Nordsee, dem ostfriesischen Festland und der Nordseeküste praktisch vereint in der Hosentasche. Die Ostfriesland App wird Dein unverzichtbarer Begleiter in Deinem Urlaub in Ostfriesland und an der ostfriesischen Nordseeküste! Einen schönen Ostfriesland Urlaub wünscht Dein Ostfriesland App Team! P.S. Zum Start der App verlosen wir bis zum 30.09.2013 einen Wellness-Gutschein vom Strandhotel Kurhaus Juist im Wert von 1.000 Euro und 10 Tankgutscheine im Wert von je 50 Euro. Schau‘ doch mal auf www.ostfriesland-app.de vorbei. Discover the beauty of East Friesland and the East Frisian Islands with the new free guide app from The Local. The app features the usual high quality comprehensive information on attractions, beaches, restaurants, entertainment, events, shopping and lodging. You can find in the app along with all ferry times to the islands of Borkum, Juist, Norderney, Langeoog, Spiekeroog Wangerooge Baltrum even cyclists and Watts walks, a tide, current weather forecasts and webcams in the region. You want your holiday to do something for your fitness? In Ostfriesland app you will find a variety of sports and water sports. With the guide of the app Local So you have all the necessary information about the East Frisian Islands in the North Sea, the East Frisian mainland and the North Sea coast combines practically in your pocket. The Ostfriesland app is your essential companion in your holiday in East Frisia and the North Sea coast! A beautiful Ostfriesland holiday wishes your team Ostfriesland app! P.S. To launch the app we are giving away up to 30.09.2013 a spa voucher from the beach Kurhaus Juist worth 1,000 euros and 10 fuel vouchers to the value of 50 euro. Look 'it out at www.ostfriesland-app.de over.

NEU: Mit PAYSMART können Sie einfach und sicher bezahlen – ab sofort im RAUM KÖLN/BONN und bald auch deutschlandweit. Profitieren Sie von NEUKUNDEN-GUTSCHEINEN und attraktiven Händlerangeboten. Ihr Smartphone wird zur Geldbörse. Keine lästige Kleingeldsuche. Sparen Sie sich den Weg zum Geldautomaten. PIN eingeben und QR-Code des Händlers scannen 2. Zu zahlenden Betrag eingeben 3. Betrag überprüfen und optional ein Trinkgeld geben 4. Quittungsscreen dem Händler zeigen - FERTIG! Der Betrag wird anschließend per Lastschrift von Ihrem Bankkonto abgebucht. HÖCHSTE SICHERHEIT: Die Deutsche Post sorgt mit höchsten Standards für die Sicherheit der Zahlung. Ihre Daten bleiben jederzeit geschützt. --------------------------------------------------- PAYSMART Nutzer über die App: „Ich finde PAYSMART vor allem für kleine Geldbeträge sehr praktisch. Bei meiner Bäckerei bin ich nicht mehr auf das lästige Kleingeld angewiesen und das Smartphone hat man ja immer griffbereit.“ – Annika F. aus Köln --------------------------------------------------- PAYSMART HÄNDLER WERDEN: Sie haben ein Geschäft und wollen Ihren Kunden Mobile Payment anbieten? Werden Sie PAYSMART Händler! description: With the Application Manager you can manage the applications on your smartphone or tablet. It offeres a quick access to existing Android functions. In the list of applications there is also a quick overview of the requested rights of an application displayed. Notes: The options to sort applications by their last update time or their first install time are only working with Android 2.3 and above. The SD card icon can only be shown with Android 2.3 and above. If you use the Task Manager, you do not need the Application Manager. All of its functions are included in the Task Manager.

description: Schafkopf ist ein beliebtes, deutsches Kartenspiel und wird von Jung und Alt mit großer Begeisterung gespielt. Egal, ob Anfänger oder Profi-Spieler, in Absolute Schafkopf pro findest Du, was Du für eine spannende Partie Schafkopf brauchst. Verschiedene Schwierigkeitsstufen und umfangreiche Einstellungen für den Spielablauf geben Dir die Möglichkeit das Kartenspiel individuell zu gestalten. Spiele mit verschiedenen Kartensätzen, die selbstverständlich auch ein Bayerisches Blatt beinhalten. Starte jetzt einen gemütlichen Schafkopfabend! Mit dem Erwerb von Absolute Schafkopf pro holst Du Dir ein komplettes Spiel. Keine In-App Verkäufe, keine Werbung. Alle Extras und Boni sind bereits im Spiel enthalten und müssen nicht zusätzlich erworben werden. Einmal kaufen und den kompletten Spielspaß im vollen Umfang genießen! Spezielle Kartendecks und Kartenanordnungen für Handys und kleine Displays (XXL Mode) ermöglichen auch auf diesen Geräten ein ermüdungsarmes Spielen. Folgende Sonderregeln sind u.a. verfügbar: - Kurzes Blatt (ohne 7 und 8) - Kontra - Hochzeit - Muss-Spiel - Ramsch (incl. Durchmarsch und Jungfrau) Des Weiteren stehen u.a. zur Auswahl: - Farbsolo (Karosolo, Herzsolo, Piksolo, Kreuzsolo) - Wenz - Geier - Tout - Rufspiel (Karo, Pik, Kreuz) Ausserdem steht eine Tarif-Auswahl (1-1000) sowohl für das Solospiel als auch für das Normalspiel jeweils für: Grundtarif, Schneider und Schwarz zur Verfügung (weit über 100.000 Variationen) Features: - Verschiedene Schwierigkeitsgrade - 13 verschiedene Kartendecks (deutsche und französische Blätter), mehrere speziell für Handyspieler! - Verschiedene Kartenansichten für mehr Überblick im Spiel - Zuschaltbare Spieloptionen, wie: Letzten Stich ansehen, schnellere/langsamere Animationen, Punkte anzeigen, Avatare, Sprechblasen an-,abschalten u.v.a.m. - Verschiedene Spielfelder - Intelligente Gegner - Umfangreiche Spielauswertung - Profilerstellung für verschiedene Spieler - Individuelle Speicherfunktion - Zusätzliche, spezielle Low-Grafik-Version für Geräte mit wenig freiem Speicher Dies ist die deutsche Version! Sheepshead is a popular German card game and is played by young and old with great enthusiasm. Whether beginner or professional player, in absolute per capita sheep you can find what you need for an exciting game of Sheepshead. Various difficulty levels and extensive settings for gameplay give you to make the cards individually the opportunity. Games with different card decks, which of course include a Bavarian sheet. Start now a cozy evening Sheepshead! With the acquisition of Absolute sheep per capita You bring you a complete game. No in-app sales, not advertising. All extras and bonuses are already included in the game and need not be purchased separately. Buy once and enjoy the entire game in full! Special decks of cards and card assemblies for mobile phones and small displays (XXL mode) on these devices allow a fatigue-free playing. The following special rules are inter alia available: - Short blade (without 7 and 8) - Contraindications - Wedding - Must Play - Junk (including walkover and Virgin) Furthermore, inter alia are to choose from: - Color solo (Karosolo, heart Solo, Piksolo, cross solo) - Wenz - Vulture - Tout - Ace game (diamonds, spades, clubs) Moreover it has a collective-choice (1-1000) for both solo play as well as for the normal for each game: Basic rate, Schneider and Black available (over 100,000 variations) Features: - Different levels of difficulty - 13 different decks of cards (German and French newspapers), more specifically for mobile gamers! - Different map views for better overview in the game - Selectable game options, such as: View Last Stitch, faster / slower animations, view points, avatars, speech on, off and much more - Different Fields - Intelligent enemies - Extensive game analysis - Creating a profile for different players - Custom memory function - Additional, special low-graphics version for devices with low memory   This is the German version!

Emulsify is a simple image editing app. You can switch between a variety of filters that are fun for you and your family. Some features include: • Map Gallery - See where you've taken and edited photos through Emulsify! • Multiple filter application - Why not have a inverse black and white photo? • Imgur uploading - Because hyperlinks are fun!
release_text: • Minor fixes to map feature • Friendlier Editor layout for tablets (Landscape mode enabled)

description: SuperVision+ is the only magnifier (magnifying glass) app on the market that offers a supreme live image stabilization capability. Highly magnified images are usually shaking. It is a problem especially for old people. No more image shaking with SuperVision+ magnifier (magnifying glass). Highlighted in Technology News for People Who Are Blind or Visually Impaired published by the American Foundation for the Blind. From reading small print at near distance to seeing signs at far distance, SuperVision+ magnifier (magnifying glass) is your go-to app for seeing better and clearer. Place your phone camera close to small objects, the app can also be used as a microscope. You can see something small that even normally sighted people can't see. Features: - Easy to activate stabilization. Just press the screen and hold. - Option to only stabilize vertically, allowing horizontal reading movement. - Large and highly visible buttons. - Freeze images at high resolution for seeing details. - Easy to use either with one hand or two hands. - Landscape mode - Flash light support. - Save images to gallery. - Share images to social network. - No advertisement.

It's your first day on the job at the local zoo and all of the animals have escaped! Explore the zoo, beach, suburbs and downtown to get them all safely back to home. There's just one catch: you have sickle cell disease. But that's not going to stop you! Avoid infections, hydrate often, check in with your physician, and take your medication to deal with chronic pain and potential crises. With your net in hand, it's up to you to save the day!

TC3 Mobile is a simple app that allows user to access up-to-date college information. The app includes 3 “tabs” - the TC3 Tab, the myTC3 Tab, and the Panthers Tab. The TC3 Tab – Provides up to date college information, including the daily TC3 Eatery menu, TC3 News, staff directory, student activities and more. The myTC3 Tab – Includes student specific information such as grades, class schedules and gives the student an easy way to contact their instructors and advisor. Also included are links to myMAIL , and other myTC3 services. Faculty can view their class lists, teaching schedules, list of advisees and more. The Panthers Tab – provides information about Panthers athletics, including games time, scores, team information and more.
release_text: Version 1.3 Map view for all TC3 Locations open Google Maps Updated Targeted Version.

description: -В версии "плюс" отсутствует реклама -Версия "плюс" содержит 16 дополнительных аргументов на актуальные темы Данное приложение позволит Вам подобрать в кратчайшие сроки аргументы для сочинения по русскому языку (C1) при подготовке к Единому Государственному Экзамену (ЕГЭ). Сборник представляет собой множество аргументов для наиболее часто встречающихся (и не очень часто) в текстах С1 проблемы. Приложение будет дополняться и совершенствоваться вплоть до самого экзамена. ЕГЭ, Русский, Русский Язык, Единый Государственный Экзамен, ЕГЭ по русскому, Аргументы, Сочинение, Шпаргалка, Экзамен

Dial directly from your SmartWatch. Also, enables fast T9 smart search through the contacts by name or company name. Search using two alphabets at the same time. Available alphabets are: * Latin (all Latin-based European languages are supported) * Cyrillic (Russian, Serbian, Ukrainian, Belorussian, Bulgarian...) * Greek * Hebrew * Arabic INSTRUCTIONS: SWIPE LEFT: to delete the last typed number or character SWIPE RIGHT: to delete all SWIPE UP / DOWN: to switch to T9 search SWIPE UP / DOWN: to list through the search results in T9 mode LONG TAP ON THE TOP GREEN BAR: to make a call To use pauses when dialing a number: LONG TAP ON ONE: to enter ; in numeric mode LONG TAP ON TWO: to enter , in numeric mode To enter + for international dialing: LONG TAP ON ZERO in numeric mode. + will be entered only as a first character. LiveWare™ extension for SmartWatch Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2
release_text: v.2.0 * Support for SmartWatch2 v.1.6 * Added missing text. v.1.5 * Smooth text. v.1.4 * Bug-fix v.1.3 * Localization on 12 languages (Russian, German, Arabic, Hebrew, Spanish, Greek, Dutch, Polish, Ukrainian, Belorussian, Bulgarian, Czech) * Haptic feedback (aka vibration) * Optimizations v.1.2 * Fixed issue with the dialing delay, there is no delay now. * Choose which screen is initially shown in the app's settings. * Bug-fixes v.1.1 * Bug-fix

description: Write and send SMS from your Sony SmartWatch. Compose message using T9 keyboard. Send to an existing contact in your address book, or directly input the recipient's number. Type the message directly, or choose from the templates which you can define in the app settings. Use codes such as %name, which will be replaced with the recipient's name upon sending ;-) UPDATE, v5.8: If the app is performing slowly, TURN SPELLING SUGGESTIONS OFF IN THE SETTINGS. Spelling suggestions are currently available for these languages: * English * Russian * Italian * German * French * Portuguese * Greek * Serbian * Croatian * Slovenian The spelling suggestions need to be enabled in the app settings (on your phone/tablet) first. Use the keyboard switch (top right) to select the keyboard and turn spelling suggestions on / off. DELETE a char via the <- button on the right. Insert SPACE via the _ button on the left. SWIPE UP/DOWN to scroll through the text suggestions. Video demo: www.youtube.com/watch?v=6oXgRGLCWkA INSTRUCTIONS (for SmartWatch2 and v5 see the note above): ======================================================== Step 1.A: Write the message ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Swipe RIGHT to input SPACE Swipe LEFT to DELETE Swipe UP to enter CAPS Swipe DOWN to switch between keyboards. When done writing, LONG TAP the blue area to confirm the message contents. Step 1.B: Choose from a template ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- LONG TAP the "Use predefined message?" = Template list mode = Swipe UP and DOWN to find the template you want to use. LONG TAP the template to preview it (i.e. switch to Template preview mode) LONG TAP the blue area on the left to directly select the template, without previewing. Swipe LEFT to switch to Template preview mode = Template preview mode = Swipe UP and DOWN to find the template you want to use. LONG TAP the blue area with the text "Use this one" to select the template. LONG TAP on the gray area with the text "Cancel" to return to Step 1.A Swipe RIGHT to switch to Template list mode Step 2: Select the recipient from your contact list, or directly enter the number -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Swipe LEFT: to delete the last typed number or character Swipe RIGHT: to delete all Swipe UP / DOWN: to switch to T9 search Swipe UP / DOWN: to list through the search results in T9 mode LONG TAP on the green area to confirm the selection / input. LiveWare™ extension for SmartWatch Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2
release_text: v.5.8 * Option to turn spelling suggestions off (for better performance) * Spelling suggestions for Portuguese, Greek, Serbian, Croatian and Slovenian. v.5.7 * Spelling suggestions for Russian, French and German. v.5.6 * Bug fixes * Optimization v.5.5 * Italian spelling * Emoticons
