Emergency Information: ICE (In Case of Emergency) Plus Save multiple users important medical information on your phone which can then be accessed from the Lock Screen by emergency medical services. EMS can call your emergency contacts from the lock screen. Also allows you to email your information, which can come in handy at doctors offices. Contains the following fields: Personal Information -Name -Date of birth -Sex -Height -Weight -Blood type -Organ donor -Street -Town -State -Zip code Medical History -Pre-Existing medical conditions -Allergies -Prior surgery -Medications -Special instructions Emergency Contacts Insurance Information -Insurance provider -Policy number *Please contact me with any problems or suggestions*

User will be satisfied with this Portuguese - English dictionary because: - It has the largest vocabulary - Detail description for each word and a lot of samples - Simple UI & high performance make you feel easy when using * Full support pronunciation for both English and Portuguese will help you so much in study these languages. (This application can run in offline mode but need the internet connection for the pronunciation and web browser functions.) This free dict works well in all android devices including mobile and tablet, it is very useful for all kinds of people although in offline environment. - For student, pupil or researcher, this app is the largest thesaurus help them make the deeply investigation in each words and phrases including idiom, slang, noun, verb, adjective, adverb... The largest vocabulary and lexicon will help people find all special words in all branch; medicine, medicinal, math, chemical, horoscope, biology, aetiology, physics, physiology... - For the English learners, this is the perfect tool to improve your lexicon, idiolect and grammar skill by so many detailed examples and conjugation supported. This dictionary has all the advantages of other dicts so it will help you improve skills in speaking, writing, reading, listening, conversation and well prepare for the tests such as TOEFL, IELTS... - For the translator or interpreter, this tool will give you quickly the good translation and also the pronunciation of both languages by only one tap. - This is also the indispensable tool for travelers, with this dict in your mobile you can finish the journey in anywhere in Portugal or Brazil without any communication problem with local people. Good luck and merry using my product :)

Los precios de la gasolina y el diesel en España. Esta aplicación te permite consultar las estaciones de servicio cerca de tu ubicación con los precios del combustible actualizados a diario. GasolinaApp te permite: - Seleccionar el tipo de combustible (Gasolina 95, Gasolina 98, Diesel, Biodiesel...) - Ordenar los resultados por precio o por distancia - Visualizar las gasolineras en un mapa y obtener las rutas para llegar a ellas. - Comparar el precio de cada gasolinera con el precio medio del combustible - Ver si ha subido o bajado el precio en cada estación de servicio. - ACTUALIZADOS DE NUEVO A DIARIO LOS DATOS DE LAS GASOLINERAS (desde el 20/02/2013). Perdonen las molestias por los problemas de los últimos días. The prices of petrol and diesel in Spain. This application allows you to view the service stations near your location with fuel prices updated daily. GasolinaApp allows you to: - Select the type of fuel (Gasoline 95, Gasoline 98, Diesel, Biodiesel ...) - Sort results by price or distance - Display gas stations on a map and get the routes to reach them. - Compare the price for each gas station with the average fuel price - See if the price gone up or down in each station. - NEW UPDATED DAILY DATA REFUELING (from 20/02/2013). Sorry for the inconvenience for the problems of the last few days.
release_text: - ACTUALIZADOS DE NUEVO A DIARIO LOS DATOS DE LAS GASOLINERAS (desde el 20/02/2013). Perdonen las molestias por los problemas de los últimos días. - Solución de Bugs y mejoras de rendimiento

A very entertaining challenge that will help you get the knight moving skill when playing chess. Now begins the Champions League and with this application you can read the song and play it as you prepare to see the best teams in Europe.

app_name: Read My Feed, Listen News FREE
description: Search your favorite feed, add it to the list and press play. News feeds will be combined sequentially or mixing the items by date and time. Features: + news to speech app: it downloads RSS feed items (titles and summaries) and plays them using TTS (text to speech) + search for feeds using the search engine; + listen the selected feeds of your list, sequentially or mixed by date/time; + listen full article shaking your device (works only with websites optimized for this task); + search for news and listen them using keywords; + simple user interface with comfortable buttons to update and listen the news with just 1 click; + multiple language feeds support (require the selected TTS voices installed); + after updating the news the app works offline (but not the "listen full article" function). Notes: + voice quality doesn't depend on the app, there are good TTS engines on Google Play (some of them also free); + if you find a bug, for tips, or something didn't work as expected please contact me; + FREE version is like the paid one but with ADs; if you like this app please buy it, it is a motivation to add more functions.
release_text: Please rate this app if you like it 1.7.2 - New settings: set app volume; minor improvements 1.7.0 - Search field hidden; internal improvements 1.6.6 - Pause playing on incoming calls; UI improvements 1.6.4 - Notification icon when playing; small fix to TTS init 1.6.2 - Fix: with some devices the app stopped speaking when screen went off 1.6.0 - UI improvements 1.5.5 - Fixed scroll on feed editor for small screen devices; changed pause icon to stop icon

description: This is the Periodic Table of the Elements application. Ideal for students and investigators who need to access to an element's information in a fast and easy way! You just have to click on element's name and the next information will be displayed: - Name - Symbol - Group and Period - Element category - Atomic weight - Atomic number - Electron configuration - Electron per shell - Valence Available in English, French, Italian, Portuguese and Spanish.
release_text: 1.0.6 Ad deleted from main screen. 1.0.5 Improved internal performance. Share app button 1.0.4 French, Italian an Portuguese translation.

description: Primera aplicación oficial de la Dirección General de Tráfico. Podrás crear tus rutas más utilizadas para conocer las incidencias que existan en la carretera; además de consultar la información de tráfico siempre que lo desees, acceder a las cámaras oficiales de tráfico y a la localización de radares. Acceso directo al teléfono de urgencias 112. Aviso sonoro de incidencias graves. Esta aplicación mantiene continuamente el uso del GPS. El uso continuado del GPS puede reducir considerablemente la duración de la batería. keywords:dgt, cámaras, atascos, radares, carreteras, viaje, itinerario, rutas, desplazamientos, tráfico First official implementation of the Traffic Department. You can create your most used routes for existing issues on the road, in addition to consulting traffic information whenever you want, to access the cameras and traffic officers locating radars. Direct access to emergency phone 112. Beep serious incident. This application keeps continuously using GPS. Continued use of GPS can significantly reduce battery life. keywords: dgt, cameras, jamming, radar, road, travel, route, routes, travel, traffic

Do you often forget to congratulate your friend happy birthday? If so, this application will keep Your friendships. Auto Birthday SMS - automatically sends an SMS message (Greeting) on the day of Your friend's birthday. This is how it works: - Add birthdays to Your contacts (to make it even easier, You can import dates of birth from Facebook, Google Calendar or CSV file); - Select friends whom You wish to auto-send a birthday greeting on that special day; - Write greeting text; - Activate application. Now every friend You have selected in auto SMS application will receive a nice birthday greeting from You when the time comes. Permissions used in application: Write to Contact Book - You can create a new contact directly from application; Read from Contact Book - displays names of Your friends in application; Storage - uses database to store application settings; System tools - application runs in the background to check for coming birthdays everyday; Network communication - needed if You want to import dates of birth from facebook or synchronize with Google Calendar; Service that cost you money - as always, Your mobile carrier will charge You for SMS.

ESV Strong’s Bible+ by Olive Tree is a must-have app for reading and studying God’s Holy Word. Take notes, highlights, and bookmarks in the app and sync to all your devices. This free Bible Study App features a powerful Resource Guide that links your Bible text with outstanding study Bibles, maps, commentaries, and more for an in-depth Bible study experience. Start a Bible reading plan and Bible+ will track your progress as you read through Scripture. Our unique split window allows you to create your own customized parallel Bible to easily compare Bible translations. Install now and explore over 100 more free titles. ESV Strong’s Bible+ by Olive Tree includes the English Standard Version (ESV) Bible translation with Strong’s Tagging. OFF-LINE BIBLE STUDY Your library, notes, highlights and all of the app features are stored on your device so that you have full functionality when you are offline or in airplane mode. CLOUD SYNC Sync your Bible study resources, highlights, notes, bookmarks, and book ribbons between any devices with Bible+. POWERFUL RESOURCE GUIDE With our one-of-a-kind Resource Guide, perform powerful searches through your entire Library of Bibles, Bible commentaries, Bible dictionaries, and more. FAST VERSE NAVIGATION With our unique 3-touch Verse Chooser, you can navigate quickly and easily to the exact Bible verse you want. SIDE-BY-SIDE STUDY The split window feature allows you to create your own customized parallel Bible for translation comparison, view your study notes while you read, or follow along with a commentary while you study Scripture. IMMERSIVE BIBLE STUDY Remove distractions by opening your books and Bibles in full screen and immerse yourself in Scripture. PERSONAL BIBLE STUDY * Highlight words and passages * Take your own personalized notes * Bookmark verses * Tag anything to find it quickly later * Leave a book ribbon on a page in order to pick up where you left off * Select and copy text from any Bible or book in your Library DAILY READING PLANS *Free downloadable reading plans on various topics, books of the Bible, or specific biblical characters *Sync your reading plan across your devices with Bible+ *Plans vary in length with options as short as 5 days to as long as three years! SOCIAL BIBLE STUDY Instantly share the Bible with your friends from inside the app. Tap on a verse to share it through Twitter, Facebook or via email. AMAZING BIBLE STUDY LIBRARY The Olive Tree catalog of Bible study resources is constantly growing and offers over a hundred FREE resources and over three thousand titles available for purchase. BIBLES INCLUDED English Standard Version (ESV) Bible translation with Strong’s Tagging. OTHER BIBLES AND BIBLE STUDY RESOURCES AVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE IN-APP: * New International Version (NIV), The Message, Amplified Bible, New King James Version (NKJV), New American Standard Bible (NASB), New Living Translation (NLT), New Revised Standard Version (NRSV), and over 100 more! * Best-selling study Bibles: ESV Study Bible, NLT Study Bible, NIV Study Notes, NKJV Study Notes, Life Application Study Bible, Reformation Study Bible Notes *Word Study Bibles with Strong’s Numbers in NIV, KJV, ESV, NKJV, HCSB and NASB Bible translations * Commentaries and Study Tools: Vine’s Expository Dictionary, Expositor’s Bible Commentary; Olive Tree Bible Maps, Bible Knowledge Commentary, Zondervan Atlas of the Bible *Interlinear Bibles: Easily compare the Original Languages of the Bible with ESV, KJV, and NKJV Bible translations. *Harmony of the Gospels: Read through the life of Jesus chronologically with our unique Gospel harmonies. *Original language Bibles: Greek New Testament: NA28 & UBS-4; Hebrew Old Testament: BHS; Greek Old Testament: Septuaginta, LXX * Non-English Bibles including Spanish, Portuguese, German and more: Reina-Valera, Almeida Revista e Atualizada, Dios Habla Hoy, Luther Bibel 1984, Louis Segond, Indonesian Bible AND MANY MORE!
release_text: - Minor bug fix. * Note: If you are enjoying The OliveTree Bible Study App, please leave a new rating on the Google Play Store. It really means a lot!

description: Deep under the Earth's surface there is a secret hidden laboratory... For the last 20 years a crazy scienist has been working on a powerful energy source based on natural elements. Your mission is to help him to gather all Elemental Jewels! Addictive game from the makers of Dragon Pet & Unicorn Pet comes Elemental Jewels. Classic match-3 puzzle game powered up with incredible graphics, explosions and many different game modes. Features: ★ 5 game modes ★ Over 20 missions of adventure in campaign mode ★ classic mode for jewelry lovers ★ time attack for some adrenaline rush ★ infinite mode is exceptional when you stand in long queue ★ custom mode to crush and destroy them all in your own story ★ free & easy to play, challenging to master all missions ★ highscore tables and statistics Help doctor Jewel in his mysterious, jeweled laboratory. Please email us if you could help with localizing game to your language. If you find any problems, visit us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/aagames

Trenìt! is the most popular app to search trains timetables and prices in Italy, completely remade. Its first version, called ”Italian Trains Timetable”, was released in September 2009. Main features: - search Trenitalia, Italo, Trenord and many other trains - detailed infos about trains status - complete view of all types of available tickets - possible to sort results by ticket price - direct links to purchase tickets directly from the train companies - list of all stops, with arrival and departure times - map of the journey with all stops - optimized for tablets (with dual-pane in landscape) - possible to share the details of a trip (via email, Facebook, Whatsapp, etc.) - app available in multiple languages

This app gives you the timetables of Italian public trains, with prices, type of trains, changes, stops, lanes. It also provides real time updates on the trains and has a button for buying the ticket. NOTE: we suggest all users with Android 4.0 and higher to use the new app "Trenìt!", which has extra features: it also includes Italo trains, it gives you a complete view of all types of available tickets, the maps with the stops is available, plus much more.

Beautiful Labels helps you categorizing your Android desktop or reminding you of important deadlines or notes. Add a widget on your home screen and choose: • Text of the label • Text size • Text color • Label background

Geopaparazzi is a tool developed to do fast qualitative technical and scientific surveys. Even if the main aim is in the field of surveying, it contains tools that can be of great use also to tourists that want to keep a geo-diary. Visit the official homepage: http://www.geopaparazzi.eu for documentation. Visit the blog to find use cases and other info: http://jgrasstechtips.blogspot.it/search/label/geopaparazzi Use the mailing list for any issue and if you need help: http://groups.google.com/group/geopaparazzi-users

description: An easy and quick to use unit converter. Units are placed in logical groups. Mechanics - length, surface area, volume, mass, power, planar angle, cone angle, time Thermodynamics - density, work, pressure, performance, flow rate, temperature, amount of substance Liquids - kinematic viscosity, dynamic viscosity Electrics - electric current, electrical resistance, voltage Optics - luminous intensity, brightness, lightning Magnetism - magnetic induction, magnetic field strength, magnetic flux Computer units - graphics, transfer rates, data size, number system Others - radioactivity, speed, sound, frequency

Nou: Plata amenzii de circulație. Trebuie doar să completezi datele procesului verbal. Poți plăti instant, oriunde ai fi, chiar și amenzile soției, colegilor sau ale prietenilor, fără să riști să depășești 48 de ore și să se dubleze suma de plată. Vei primi imediat dovada plății prin e-mail. Aplicația oficială a furnizorului de serviciu de plată prin SMS, care funcționează în Arad, Bacău, Baia-Mare, Bistrița, Brașov, Cluj-Napoca, Oradea, Pitești, Ploiești, Reghin, Satu-Mare, Sighișoara, Sighetul Marmației, Turda, Târgu Mureș și Timișoara. Utilizabilă în Vodafone, Orange, Telekom și Digi Mobil în toate orașele de mai sus (exceptând Ploiești și Oradea indisponibile în Digi Mobil). Nu mai e nevoie să ții minte numere și coduri! Selectează orașul și perioada dorită și aplicația va trimite SMS-ul corespunzător pentru plata parcării. În câteva secunde vei primi un SMS de confirmare a plății. Dacă plata nu e necesară în acel moment, aplicația te va avertiza. Aplicația simplă și prietenoasă te ajută să plătești parcarea cu doar 2 atingeri pe ecran. Pe langă facilitatea de a plăti parcarea, SMS Parking iți permite sa achiți taxa de pod de la Fetești - Cernavodă și amenda de circulație. Facilități: • poți adăuga mai multe mașini; • disponibilitate pentru multe orașe din România; • pentru fiecare oraș sunt prezentate opțiunile de plată; • afișează tariful pentru fiecare zonă de parcare; • trimite automat SMS-ul cu codul zonei și numărul de înmatriculare selectat pentru plata parcării; • opțiune pentru sistemul de parcare Start/Stop pentru Timișoara și Oradea; • poți plăti amenda de circulatie; • poți plăti taxa de pod Fetești - Cernavodă; • poți cumpăra rovinieta pentru orice tip de vehicul; • istoricul plăților (numărul de înmatriculare, oraș, zonă, perioadă, tarif); • confirmare prin SMS (afișează mesajul de confirmare la plata prin SMS); • notificări (cu sunet/cu vibratie/cu sunet și vibratie); • actualizări automate (ai intotdeauna lista de orașe și zone actualizată); Plățile pentru vignetă și taxa de pod Fetesti - Cernavoda sunt operate de CNADNR. Amenda de circulație se plătește securizat prin card. Este acceptat orice card Visa sau MasterCard pentru uz electronic.

This application turns your Android device into a GPS navigator with offline maps. You can search easily locations in Brazil and you can add them to your route. Discover interesting places near you: accommodation, parking, restaurants, bars, clubs, cinemas, theatres, auto services, shops, parks, schools, hospitals, sport areas. It includes detailed maps of the biggest cities in Brazil: Sao Paulo, Rio de Janeiro, Salvador, Brasilia, Fortaleza, Belo Horizonte, Manaus, Curitiba, Recife, Porto Alegre, Belem, Goiania, Guarulhos, Campinas, Sao Goncalo and others. This application is based on Osmand project under the GNU GPLv3 license and uses high quality data from OSM.

SimpleRC transforms your smartphone into a remote control for any rc vehicle you want. You only need a bluetooth receiver which can be build with a arduino and a bluetooth module. A manual and description of the protocol can be found on www.mightyfrog.eu.

This is a mobile app for locating LPG stations around Europe. There are two features at the moment: - See all LPG stations in a country on a map (needs to be online to see the map) - A list of LPG stations closest to your current location (needs GPS coordinates). Please send an e-mail to info@myLPG.eu if you have any suggestions, problems or if you just want to say hi. Bare in mind, that this app is still in beta. Features: - over 27.000 LPG stations - 42 countries - nearest stations - an interactive map for each country - more to come... Station info window now shows also the coordinates. If you click on the info window one more time, the coordinates (latitude and longitude) will be saved to clipboard (you can paste it in your favorite navigational app). It is possible in a limitated way to save the map for offline usage, but please test it before you need it on the road.
release_text: Updated the LPG station database - June 03 2015.

description: Welcome to the brutal, tactical beatemup world of TEKKEN, as you’ve never experienced it before! TEKKEN CARD TOURNAMENT is a new beatemup CCG with real-time fighting duels and tactical, strategic, combo battles. Join over 11 million players from around the globe in the first ever free-to-play Tekken beatemup CCG. TEKKEN CARD TOURNAMENT features stunning 3D visuals, with electrifying turn-based card battles that are loaded with satisfying depth and extreme characters. TELL ME MORE! Play TEKKEN CARD TOURNAMENT online in real-time with all the strategy and tactics you need to win. It won’t be easy; your fighting opponents come from all over the globe. Do you have what it takes to take them all on? Battle and duel with the toughest competition out there. Take on the world by collecting the best fighting cards to create your own ultimate fighting deck, featuring some of the most fearsome TEKKEN fighters. Online gameplay is fast and furious. Fight battles using combos with three actions: Focus, Strike and Block. During each turn, fighters choose whether to draw a new card from their deck, launch an attack with their cards or attempt to block. Think fast, fight faster. Don’t just think with your fists in this CCG. Strategy and tactics are key with less than 10s to make decisions and guess what your competition is planning with their deck. Winning bouts needs composure, bluffing and intuition. Use combos to destroy your opponents in duels and win global competitions and tournaments. Challenge the best fighters, win bouts and uncover all the cards! Collect over 190 physical TEKKEN CARD TOURNAMENT Game Cards and bring real-world crossover to the gameplay, with unique QR codes letting you instantly add the card to your digital deck in-game, and Augmented Reality bringing the characters to life in players’ environments. Launch into combo card battles globally online with skill-matched players from around the world, and give their TEKKEN iron fist a workout anytime, anywhere. It’s a truly global beatemup CCG! WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING ABOUT THIS STUNNNING 3-D CCG: “There's a depth to Tekken Card Tournament that's severely lacking in other free-to-play card games.” – Pocketgamer.co.uk 8/10 “Genuinely fun to play against others.” - GamesReviews.com 8/10 GAME FEATURES DEEP GAMEPLAY: Customise your online deck. Use the fusion system to create and collect new cards, and perfect your strategic combos of Focus, Strike and Block moves to take down competition from across the globe. AMAZING VISUALS: High quality, liquid smooth 3D graphics known to the TEKKEN universe are faultlessly rendered in this beatemup game. WORLDWIDE COMPETITION: Train in solo play until you are ready to challenge matched opponents to duel around the globe online. Your aim is to climb the global rankings, with extra rewards available to win in themed contests and weekly battles. SOLO CAMPAIGN: Take up 50 unique challenges to test your skill and tactical judgement all over Japan. More countries and challenges in the next updates. TAG: A “tag deck” doubles the action in the game with a second character. Fight, and a card is randomly drawn from either deck for your main character. So if one on one isn’t enough in your world, start your tag deck for two vs two! Strike, and see your characters fight with the move on the card. If you have any problems or suggestions you can reach us at support@tekken-card-tournament.com (support in English and French only) See our FAQ page: http://www.tekken-card-tournament.com/faq Please note that a network connection is required to play. Our Terms of Service are available at the following address: http://www.tekken-card-tournament.com/general_conditions Let’s duel!

description: Fahrtenbuch mit automatischer Aufzeichnung via GPS Mobilität erfordert innovative Lösungen. Mit DriversLog, der mobilen GPS Fahrtenbuchlösung lassen sich die Fahrten automatisch erfassen, die Steueraufwendungen reduzieren und die 1%-Regelung umgehen. Mit der DriversLog Fahrtenbuch-Lösung können Fahrten via GPS automatisch aufgezeichnet oder manuell erfasst werden. Die auf die Finanzbehörden abgestimmte Revisionssicherheit, materielle Richtigkeit und formelle Ordnungsmäßigkeit ist dabei entscheidend um eine pauschale Besteuerung zu umgehen und damit einen erheblichen Steuervorteil zu erlangen. Vorteile: - Server Standort ist München - Service und Support inklusive - Aufzeichnung einer Fahrt via GPS - Statistik Informationen (Strecke, Zeit, Höchstgeschwindigkeit, Durchschnittsgeschwindigkeit, max. Höhe, min Höhe, Anzahl der Streckenpunkte) und Darstellung der Geschwindigkeit in einer Grafik - Darstellung der gefahrenen Strecke in einer Karte mit Start- und Zielmarkierung - Automatische Ermittlung von Startort und Zielort (Reverse Geocoding) mit der Möglichkeit den jeweiligen Ort um die Straßenbezeichnung zu ergänzen. - Die Fahrten werden in einem Rechenzentrum in München entsprechend den Vorgaben der Finanzbehörden archiviert. Dieser mobile Service spart Kosten und Zeit und ist ohne Schulungsaufwand sofort produktiv nutzbar. ACHTUNG: Für die vollumfängliche Nutzung der App einschließlich dem Online Fahrzeugpool benötigen Sie ein Benutzerkonto ( www.driverslog.de ). Die Applikation wird mit umfangreichem Online Service & Support für eine Nutzungsgebühr in Höhe von 4,17 € (inkl. MwSt.) mtl. zur Verfügung gestellt. Weitere Informationen werden unter www.driverslog.de "Fahrtenbuch" bereitgestellt. Auf Anfrage unter info@driverslog.de können Sie die vollumfängliche Nutzung 30 Tage kostenlos testen. Um alle Fahrten schließlich übersichtlich aufbereitet zu Papier zu bringen, genügt ein Tastendruck bzw. Touch auf dem Smartphone. Das Fahrtenbuch wird daraufhin im weit verbreiteten PDF-Format erstellt, verschlüsselt, mit einem Fingerprint versehen und per E-Mail versandt. Die aufgezeichneten Informationen werden manipulationssicher gespeichert und vom Mobilfunkgerät an einen Host (Internet) übertragen. In einem Online Fahrzeugpool werden die Fahrzeuge verwaltet, die Fahrer dem jeweiligen Fahrzeug zugeordnet und die Fahrtenbücher jährlich archiviert. Es kostet erheblich weniger Zeit als das handschriftliche Fahrtenbuch und Risiken wie der Verlust oder die Unleserlichkeit der schriftlichen Aufzeichnungen werden ausgeschlossen. DriversLog ist sowohl für Selbständige und Arbeitnehmer mit Firmen-PKW als auch für Unternehmen mit Fuhrpark geeignet. Logbook with automatic recording via GPS Mobility requires innovative solutions. With Driverslog, the mobile GPS logbook solution can be the driving record automatically reduce the tax expenses and avoid the 1% rule. With the Driverslog logbook solution rides can be automatically recorded via GPS or manually entered. The coordinated with the tax authorities audit compliance, material correctness and formal regularity is crucial to avoid a flat-rate taxation and thus to gain a significant tax advantage. Advantages: - Server location is Munich - Service and Support Included - Recording of a trip via GPS - Statistical information (distance, time, speed, average speed, max height, min height, number of track points.) And representation of the speed in a graphic - Presentation of the distance traveled in a map with start and end marker - Automatic determination of start and destination (Reverse Geocoding) with the possibility of the respective location to complement the street name. - The journeys are archived in a data center in Munich and comply with the tax authorities. This mobile service saves time and money and is without special training immediately productive use. NOTE: For the complete use of the app including the online vehicle pool you need a user account (www.driverslog.de). The application comes with an extensive online service and support for a fee in the amount of 4.17 € (incl. VAT) per month. provided. Further information is provided at www.driverslog.de "logbook". Cribs info@driverslog.de You can full benefit of 30 days for free. To view all trips to finally bring clearly presented on paper, a keystroke or touch enough on the smartphone. The logbook is then created in the popular PDF format, encrypted, provided with a fingerprint and sent via e-mail. The recorded information is stored tamper-proof and transmitted from mobile devices to a host (Internet). In an online car pool vehicles are managed, the driver assigned to the respective vehicle and archived logbooks annually. It costs considerably less time than the hand-written logbook and risks such as the loss or illegibility of written records be excluded. Driverslog is suitable for both self-employed and workers with company cars and for companies with fleet.

description: Can you imagine talking into your phone in one language and hearing translated voice in another language? With Lyngo now it's possible. Speak into your phone and it immediately speaks back to you in one of described languages. You can try Lyngo and other popular applications like that. After compare you will find out that only Lyngo has the best accuracy and quality of speech recognition. Try it now. It's free for limited time. Typical usage: - business meeting. - trip to another country - language lessons - write SMS. EMAILS, TWITTER and Facebook posts in foreign language by speech Voice Recognition is available for this languages: English(US), English(UK), English(AUS), French(EU), French(CAN), Italian, German, Spanish(MX), Spanish(US), Japanese, Mandarin Chinese, Cantonese Chinese, Taiwanese Mandarin, Dutch, Korean, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Polish, Portuguese(EU), Portuguese(BR), Russian You can also use this app without voice recognition for this languages: Slovak, Greek, Hindi, Thai, Turkish, Arabic, Catalan, Bahasa If you like our hard work in design and programming please rate us ! If we get good rates we will improve the app with new languages and new functions. IMPORTANT NOTICE ! In order app to work properly you must talk as clear as possible and as close as possible to the microphone. App needs also good internet connection to work properly. Please check if your device meet above constraints before use.
release_text: * Added new languages: Turkish, Czech, Arabic (Saudi), Arabic (Egypt), Arabic(UAE), Finnish, Hungarian, Romanian, Vietnamese, Bahasa * Fixed bug with Portuguese accent.

description: Pub buddy is application that helps you control consumption of the drinks and of the other stuff during your visit in the restaurant. Once you will add a drink or food it will appear on the main screen. There is sliding area on the right side of the screen where you can increase number of drinks by sliding from top to bottom or decrease it by sliding in opposite direction. It is not just beer counter or drink counter application it helps you to perform check sum of the your bill. By touching the name of the pub in top of screen you can manage your favourite pubs.
release_text: 2.6 New black and white colour schemes. User interface corrections 2.4 Added translations User interface improvements 2.2 User interface simplification. 2.1 Added German langue and minor bug-fixes. 2.0 Profiles of the favourite pubs, new icon and Android 2.1 support. 1.10 Slider guidance and new background 1.9 Haptic feedback support and bug-fixes. Removal of the single item by long touch on it.

description: Aviation Pocketknife is an app with small tools for your flights. If you find a bug or if you have some suggestions /wishes for an improvement I would appreciate if you wolud send me a mail. Please remind that I can´t answer on remarks which you make at the market. Features: - Unit Converter - Extra Fuel Calculator - Crosswind Calculator - Met Calculator ~ Min useable Flight Level ~ Deviation from ISA ~ Density Altitude ~ Relative Humidity - Navigation Calculator ~ Wind direction / speed ~ Heading, Groundspeed, WCA ~ Course, Groundspeed, WCA ~ Non Precession Approach Calculator - Airport Information with weather, google map (you need IATA / ICAO dictionary for it) - Notams - Weather query (NOAA) - Snowtam Decoder - Aviation abbreviations - Volmet Frequencies (Europe andNort Africa)
release_text: 1.2 New Layout for Tablets 1.3. Bug fixes at NPA Calculator 1.4 Bug fix at the Fuel Converter and at the Snowtam Guide 2.0 CP / PNR calculation HF Volmets

description: A Digital Clock widget with size 4x2 It features: 212 skins 12/24 hr+Color on all info displayed System Stats Info + pop-up Weather & Forecast 2 Weather layouts on clock(user choice) 2 Forecast layouts(user choice) +tap bottom right->preferences +tap bottom left->system information dialog +tap weather icon->forecast +tap Hour->launch anything!(more coming) +tap Minutes->launch anything! Widgets on Android work a bit differently than a normal application. Unlike regular programs they don't just install themselves in the application tray so you have to add them manually. They will not open or launch. Here's how to add a widget on your Android home screen. STEPS HOW TO ADD A WIDGET ========================== 1.On your Android home screen, tap any blank or “empty” area with size 4x2 and hold down your finger. 2.An “Add to Home screen” window will pop up. From that window, tap “Widgets”. 3.You’ll be presented with a list of all the installed Widgets on your Android device. 4.Select the clock to add to your home screen by tapping it. Notes ===== "Time frozen/not updating"-> taskiller killed the clock(exclude it from taskillers) When phone starts, clock starts in less than a min too. ROM users-> make sure the clock is NOT moved on SD card. Widgets are not supposed to be on SD card. Move it back to the phone storage. Weather hint: For world destinations with two words in the name, type in the box the words with a plus sign. For example "Buenos Aires" type "Buenos+Aires",remember the "+" sign -no spaces, don't include the quotes. Skins: Check our website for help, and send to us your creations. Email problems/suggestions Check our website for more help. EXCLUDE IT FROM TASKILLERS!!! Be polite, this is a free app :-) VIDEO HOW TO ADD WIDGETS http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DpMLF9b2aTQ

description: Bus timetable for Finland.

This dice app feels like real dice in the box! It sets the bar for virtual dice casting to a whole new level. Tap the background to show or hide die menu. Add a few dice, then try shaking, sliding and throwing them. Turn your phone upside down and see how dice fall into the glass. Rotate your phone to observe beautiful light reflects. You can change box style, die style and other settings from application preferences. If you have an older device, disabling visual effects and sound effects improves performance - for optimum performance disable all effects and set die style to matte. The recipe for the most realistic dice app in the market reveals that only the best ingredients were used: - Rightware Kanzi framework for stunning 3D graphics - Bullet physics engine for fascinating, realistic physics modeling - State-of-the-art AHRS sensor fusion algorithm for fast and accurate movement tracking Use sensor fusion to accurately calculate every movement of the device: tilting, shaking, rotating. Apply measured movements to a 3D box. Add freely moving dice according to your own flavour, but make sure that they slide, roll and bounce naturally. Finally render the graphics using HW acceleration. Decorate with sound and vibration effects. Serve warm and FREE. Have a bite and download yours now! As usual, share freely. If you're interested, the sensor fusion algorithm is open source and available under LGPL license (contact us for more information). You are welcome to ask questions, discuss and read news about our other apps at http://finweaiapps.blogspot.fi Stay tuned for other amazing apps from Finwe Ltd.
release_text: 2.2 Graphics, performance & compatibility updates - Improved physics - Improved shadow effect - Now faster due to various performance updates - Reduced VRAM consumption by 30% and RAM consumption over 50% 2.1 Better performance & Nexus 7 support - Dramatically improved rendering performance - Improved performance when extra visual effects disabled - Total score and mirror effect now work in Nexus 7 - Minor bug fixes

description: Please read the description before purchasing to ensure compatibility. Have you ever typed something and then accidentally erased it? Written down something important and couldn't find it again? App crashed and lost everything you wrote? With your own Type Machine, that's no problem. Type Machine saves everything you type in every app. Open it at any time to find old entries. Filter them by app. Drag the history slider to see what you typed letter by letter. Tap to copy. Never lose a piece of text again! Go back in time. Download your very own Type Machine today. ✔ Completely automatic and seamless. Logs everything from every native Android app. Complete typing history. ✔ Stays out of the way until you need it. Simple to use when you do. Brings global undo to Android. ✔ Safe and private. No unnecessary permissions. Allows you to set a PIN lock on the history list. Automatic deletion of old entries. ✔ Configurable blacklist for apps. Type Machine won't collect what you don't want it to. ✔ Tablet-friendly user interface. After installation, start Type Machine. Collection must be enabled from the device settings: instructions will be provided. Other accessibility services enabled on your device may interfere with functionality. If you need help, or have any suggestions or complaints, please e-mail us at typemachine@rojekti.fi . Your feedback is very important to us. Type Machine will function with almost every app that is built using the native Android frameworks. Password fields are not (and can not be) logged by Type Machine. For a list of known issues with specific applications, please see http://goo.gl/xGy1es . Samsung users : due to bugs in Samsung's operating system Type Machine may be incompatible with your device. Please see http://goo.gl/PnjOlK for a list of possible issues. Please contact us for a full refund if you encounter any issues. Permissions: ✔ Run at startup for scheduled automatic deletion

The FingerCMS (Central Monitoring Software) for Android is designed for use with DVRs. With state-of-the-art CMS technology for Android, virtually unlimited number of DVRs can be monitored and controlled. The key features are: . Remote monitoring and control for virtually unlimited number of DVRs, . H.264 decode capability, . Two-way audio, . Alarm input monitoring and alarm output control, . PTZ control, . Versatile live/playback display formats: 1/4/9/16 split windows, . Playback search by time or event, . Playback operations: Play, Pause, Fast Forward, Fast Backward, Single Step, etc., . Log display, . Snapshot live or recorded video, and . Password to access DVRs.

Free LED torch app. It has beautiful combination of flashlight and clock. This is the brightest, simple and very useful camera led torch and clock app. Never be caught in the dark without a light again. FEATURES - Camera LED flashlight : Use camera LED as a light source. LED Torch - Screen torch : Use screen as a light source. You can change colors and brightness. Color torch - Transparent torch : ‘Camera + flashlight’ enables you to see even the dark and narrow space like under the furniture. - Digital clock : Watch the big digital clock while using phone as a flashlight. PERMISSIONS - Camera, Flashlight : Camera flash, LED light, Camera view - Internet, Access network state : Ads
release_text: - Camera LED flashlight : Use camera LED as a light source. - Screen flashlight : Use screen as a light source. You can change colors and brightness. - Camera view : Use camera + flashlight to find well under the furnitures. - Digital clock : Watch the big digital clock while using phone as a flashlight.

description: GigBeat helps you never miss another concert by your favorite artist in your town! GigBeat scans your device's music library, shows you when your favorite artists are on tour and where they will be. Don't have any music stored on your device? That's not a problem, GigBeat offers support for Songkick, Last.fm and Rdio accounts so users can login and sync their artists from these services! GigBeat will also remind you when a concert you've starred is coming up, or notify you when it finds new tour dates in your area for artists you are tracking. GigBeat is currently fully supported on Android phones running version 2.1 or higher and is compatible with Honeycomb tablets, but a more polished version for tablets is coming very soon. Feature List: - Scans your music library for your artists. - Location based search so you can find out what's happening around you. - Ability to track multiple cities and venues. - Notifications for upcoming events, or newly added tour dates. - Link to ticket purchasing via Songkick.com - Sync tracked artists, events, and locations from your Songkick account. * - Sync artists from your Last.fm account. ** - Events from artists recommended by Last.fm ** - Sync artists from your Rdio account. *** - Check-in to concerts in Gigbeat powered by Foursquare! **** - New homescreen widget to track your favorite upcoming gigs. * Requires a Songkick.com account. ** Requires a Last.fm account. *** Requires an Rdio account. **** Requires a Foursquare account. Like us on Facebook http://facebook.com/gigbeat or follow us on Twitter @gigbeatapp to stay up to date with the latest GigBeat news. If you come across any issues with GigBeat please feel free to send us an email. We will be more than happy to assist with any issues. support@gigbeat.fm . You can now add Gigbeat to your Google+ Circles! Head over to this url to add Gigbeat! https://plus.google.com/u/0/105737735772692248409 GigBeat is developed by Michael Novak and Guenther Beyer.
release_text: - Complete interface redesign. - Added support for Android Beam on event pages. - Added simple artist information.

app_name: 课程格子-小课表，大格局
description: 课程格子是一款专门为大学生设计的课程管理及学习交流的手机应用。在这里，同学们可以随时超级方便地查看课程表，共享课程笔记，结识一起上课的同学，或者去BBS里与小伙伴嬉笑怒骂、指点江山。 过去四个学期，有近千万大学生和我们一起度过，欢迎你在新学期加入，体验课程格子里不一样的大学生活。 -千万大学生的首选校园应用，李开复老师倾力推荐 -同步高校教务系统，一键导入所有课程 -全国3000所高校全覆盖，1000万节大学课程数据 -App Store官方年度精选应用 同学评价： “超级好用的课程表，每天都有课程提醒，再也不用担心忘记上课了。”--怒做学霸 “再变态的大学课程表都能完美兼容，超级方便~”-哈哈王子 “贴纸超级有爱，课程表也可以这么美！”-么么酱 “单周双周的课，已经结束的课，看得很清楚，完全可以靠这个去上课的！”——ラオぽう “我们学校好多人用，逃课的时候特别方便找人签到，哈哈，赞！”—不想做学渣 【最快捷】 课程格子提供三种方式制作课表： - 首创课表二维码，扫一扫，轻松复制同学课表 - 对接超过1000所大学的教务系统，分分钟导入课表 - 千万课程数据库，精准推荐，一键选课生成课表 【最学霸】 - 课前提醒，课程讨论，即刻开启学霸模式！ - 考试倒计时，跟挂科说再见，大学靠谱起来 - 拍板书、记笔记，分享给一起奋斗过的同学 【最有爱】 - 格子首创“贴在课表上的贴纸”，日程安排简单有趣！ - 自由更换课表背景，课程表一样需要彰显个性 - 新生手绘地图，再大的校园也不迷路 【最好玩】 - 格子BBS尽情畅聊校园新鲜事，身边活动组队走起 - 自助创建话题版块，寻找志趣相投的小伙伴! - 实名/匿名随心切换，沟通更自由 友情提示： 一大批返校礼物已经包装完毕，参加格子的开学活动把他们领走吧：） 欢迎通过以下方式联系我们： 官方网站 http://www.kechenggezi.com 新浪微博 @课程格子 微信号ClassBox或直接搜索“课程格子”添加 用户反馈QQ群 206259768
release_text: • 重新设计分享课表功能，现在小伙伴可以点击你分享的课表直接复制课程啦 • 优化了复制课表流程，复制课表更方便 • 修复了设置内外红点不一致等Bug

description: Forrest Gump Trivia is a quiz game to test your knowledge on the 1994 American epic romantic comedy-drama film based on the 1986 novel of the same name by Winston Groom.The film starred Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise and Sally Field This app contains fifty questions.Each correct answer displays a small tidbit of info about the movie.

Remotely view and control your Foscam IP cameras. This app is designed for Foscam camera and includes the following features: - Guaranteed to work with all Foscam cameras (Receive a full refund if you are not satisfied with our app). - Remotely view and control all Foscam IP camera models . - User-friendly interface. Fast loading . - Record videso and take snapshots from your IP cameras and share videos via email - Hear audio remotely (Support 1-way audio) - Unlimited number of cameras. View up to 4 cameras on screen at a time . - Instantly capture camera's screen and send via email - Perfect for home security, pet-cam or workplaces. - Designed for both phones and tablets - Pan, tilt, zoom (PTZ) (available on selected models) - Developed by 3rd party developers. We are not affiliated with or endorsed by Foscam company. See video demo on YouTube http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fnh4JGgjsFo .

Dans la lignée des 100 portes, voici 100 grilles à ouvrir ! Ici point de leviers cachés à actionner ni de ressorts secrets à déclencher… Ce sont les mots qui vous fourniront les clés ! Résolvez les énigmes et franchissez les grilles. Mots fléchés ludiques pour amateurs de HD ("Hautes Définitions") ! Contenu détaillé : 100 énigmes originales de difficulté progressive 36 grilles de force 3/4, 50 grilles de force 4/5 et 14 de force 5/6 Près de 1200 définitions ludiques (jeux de mots, associations d'idées…) Savourez les bons mots de nombreux auteurs, un vrai régal pour l'esprit ! Combinez entre eux différents indices pour franchir les grilles plus facilement Evaluez en permanence votre force, en consultant vos stats Personnalisez les couleurs selon votre goût Application optimisée pour smartphones ET tablettes. In line with 100 doors, 100 screens here to open! Here there is no hidden levers to activate or trigger springs secrets ... These are the words that will give you the keys! Solve puzzles and go through the gates. Arrow fun for lovers of words HD ("High Definition")! Detailed content: 100 original puzzles of increasing difficulty 36 lines of force 3/4, 50 grids force 4/5 and 14 strength 5/6 Nearly 1,200 definitions fun (puns, associations of ideas ...) Enjoy the good words of many authors, a true feast for the mind! Combine them different indices to cross the gates more easily Evaluate your strength constantly, looking stats Customize the colors to your taste Application optimized for smartphones and tablets.
release_text: NOUVEAUTES DE LA VERSION 2.0 : Pour des mots fléchés encore plus ludiques, un nouveau type d'indice est maintenant disponible : les cases liées. Il permet de connaitre quelles sont les cases qui ont la même lettre dans la solution. Saurez-vous combiner au mieux les différents types d'indice à votre disposition ? Historique : Version 1.2 du 31 décembre 2013 : correctif sur grille 77, modification texte de l'aide, réglages divers Version 1.1 du 27 décembre 2013 : publication initiale de l'app

description: Avec France 3 Régions, où que vous soyez, accédez enfin à toute l’information de votre région sur votre smartphone ou votre tablette ! > Retrouvez les résultats du match du PSG contre le Losc > Préparez votre week-end en amoureux à Nantes et consultez la météo des régions > De passage à Bordeaux ? Retrouvez les évènements et sorties culturelles à ne pas rater ! > Paramétrez l'application pour recevoir les informations de votre région que vous habitiez à Toulouse, Marseille, Rennes ou Caen... • Actualité : le meilleur de l'info régionale, nationale, internationale mise à jour en temps réel et classée selon vos préférences. Commentez et réagissez en direct ! Retrouvez également les évènements sportifs et culturels qui rythment la vie des régions. • Alertes en temps réel: des notifications à chaque événement majeur envoyées sur votre smartphone et/ou votre tablette • Des services complets : le direct TV, l’intégralité des JT, les prévisions météorologiques de vos régions préférées, ou encore, un guide TV détaillé ! • Ce service est disponible et paramétrable pour toutes les régions suivantes: Alpes, Alsace, Aquitaine, Auvergne, Basse- Normandie, Bourgogne, Bretagne, Centre, Champagne-Ardenne, Corse ViaStella, Côte d’Azur, Franche-Comté, Haute-Normandie, Languedoc-Roussillon, Limousin, Lorraine, Midi-Pyrénées, Nord-Pas-de-Calais, Paris Île-de-France, Pays de la Loire, Picardie, Poitou-Charentes, Provence-Alpes, Rhône-Alpes With France Regions 3, or you are finally accessing has all the information of your region on your smartphone or tablet! > Find the results of the PSG match against LOSC > Prepare your weekend with family in Nantes and check the weather in regions > Passing a Bordeaux? Find events and cultural attractions not to be missed! > Set the application to receive information from your area that you live in Toulouse, Marseille, Rennes and Caen ... • News: the best info regional, national, international update in real time and rated according to your preferences. Reviewing and react Live! Find also sporting and cultural events that punctuate the life of regions. • Alerts in real time: each major event notifications sent to your smartphone and / or tablet • Comprehensive services: Direct TV, the entirety of JT, Weather Forecasts your preferred regions, or, a detailed TV guide! • This service is available for all and parameterizable following regions: Alps, Alsace, Aquitaine, Auvergne, Basse-Normandie, Bourgogne, Bretagne, Centre, Champagne-Ardenne Corsica ViaStella, Cote d'Azur, Franche-Comte, Haute-Normandie, Languedoc-Roussillon, Limousin, Lorraine, Midi-Pyrenees, Nord-Pas-de-Calais, Paris Ile-de-France, Pays de la Loire, Picardie, Poitou-Charentes, Provence, Rhone-Alpes

description: The Hanoi tower game. Tap Tap to move discs from one tower to another. Very efficient, no need to have small fingers! Graphics are simple, the game is meant to be efficient: KISS, keep it simple stupid. You can customize the number of discs. It works both in landscape and portrait orientations (no need to turn your phone). Hope you like it.
release_text: -Added a chronometer. -Updated winning screen -Removed some bugs

description: Take your LEGO collection everywhere ! Browse, manage your lego collection including all miniseries and minifigures! Use an unique application to keep trace of your entire lego collection. Handle and tag owned and wanted sets, figs... even for retired, promotional and special sets not listed elsewhere. The advanced search allows you to find sets and figs by name, number, year, theme...or just use the barcode scanning feature. Need instructions / guide ? View or save set instruction's on your phone ! Custom your user interface, just imagine (display all your collection, minifgures only, stored sorted options, currencies used...). All stored informations are linked to your brickset.com account (free & needed to use advanced functionnalities). Available in english, french and german. If you experience any difficulty with the app, just tell me and I can investigate and resolve the issue for you. Android's permissions summary : - android.permission.CAMERA for barcode scanning - android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE to save instructions and image cache data - android.permission.INTERNET to retrieve data through internet keywords : lego collection, legos, games, brick, bricks, guide, star wars, legoland, lego system, mindstorms, ninjago, city, catalog, minifigures, minifig, hobbit, chima, lord of the rings, instructions, collection, brickset, lugnet, bricklink, friends, brickshelf, mega bloks, toy, toys, Duplo, Parts, Sets, Technic, trains, Construction, scans, reference, lego minifigures collection for android LEGO® is a trademark of the LEGO Group of companies which does not sponsor, authorize or endorse this app.
release_text: ★ BRICK collector, final nominee and honorable mention for Best Entertainment App awards 2013 ★ More infos on http://www.bestappever.com/android/awards/2013/winner/ente Lasted review : "Perfect, a must have for LEGO fans!"

description: "Audio Player" or "Music player" - is a simple music player for Android. This player Has the features The Most Commonly used to start a playing very quickly. The application also allows you to edit its CD covers in ID3 tag files and the data base of android. The jackets come from Google Image, the applciation lets you choose between 8 frames per jacket. A widget is available and his size is customizable. Features: - Browse all music files from your smartphone by Artist / Album / Genre / Music - Add all the music of an artist / album / genre to current playlist - Edit the current playlist - Automatic recording of the last playlist - Saving the playlist with a custom name - Control over the player buttons or bluetooth headset. - Alternate color elements - Choose a color theme - Choose the number of columns to display. V 1.1:      - Select multiple tracks in the playlist      - Improving the speed of loading artists      - Contact form to suggest improvements      - New icon on the screen to go to the current playlist      - Prompt confirm before closing the application V 2.0:      - Exit the applicaiton with the "Back" button stops the playback, use "home" to reduce      - Complete change drawer navigation      - Bugfix News of version 2.3.1:      - A Widget!      - Russian language      - Spanish language      - One equalizer frequency!      - Improved route caching, data management ... Russian translation by Glum Tikhon and icons by JF Tolaguera.
release_text: News of version 2.3.1: - A Widget! - Russian language - Spanish language - One equalizer frequency! - Improved browser, caching, data management ...

description: L’application Suivi Budget pour Android vous accompagne au quotidien dans la maîtrise de votre budget. Des fonctions pratiques : - Téléchargez toutes les opérations de vos comptes, - Classez automatiquement vos dépenses dans les catégories définies (Loyer, shopping, sortie), - Obtenez une représentation graphique qui vous permet de visualiser l’état de vos dépenses et vos revenus, - Fixez des limites à ne pas dépasser sur certaines catégories de dépenses. The Budget Monitoring application for Android with you everyday in control of your budget. Convenient features: - Download all operations of your accounts, - Automatically Organize your expenses into the categories defined (Rent, shopping, out), - Get a graph that allows you to view the status of your expenses and income - Set limits not to be exceeded for certain categories of expenditure.
release_text: Plusieurs améliorations au menu de cette nouvelle version : - Désormais, c'est vous qui choisissez la périodicité des graphiques (annuels, trimestriels ou mensuels) - Seules les catégories actives seront restituées dans les graphiques - La synchronisation de l'étiquetage est maintenant automatique - Nous avons simplifié la navigation pour qu'elle soit plus intuitive Continuez à nous faire part de vos commentaires et suggestions dans la rubrique Contacts > Signaler un problème.

description: L'application Code Postal permet de retrouver un code postal à partir d'une ville, ou à l'inverse de retrouver une ville à partir de son code postal dans toute la France et les Dom-Tom. Fonctionnalités : - Trouver le code postal d'une ville - Trouver une ville à partir d'un code postal - Trouver les villes d'un département - Localiser la ville sur un plan Cette application ne nécessite pas d'accès à internet pour fonctionner. Mots clés : code postal, ville, commune, département, région, dom-tom
release_text: Nouveautés version 1.1 : - Meilleure intégration avec Google Maps (possibilité de visualiser directement dans Google Maps) - Gestion de favoris

description: USA Zip Codes application can find a zip code based on a town, or find the town with its zip code in the USA. Fonctionnalities : - Find a zip code with the name of the town - Find a town with its zip code - Find all cities of a state - Locate the town on a map You don't need internet for this application, everything is stored on your device (Except for the maps). Keywords : zip code, usa zip code, us zip codes, town, state, find zip code

Keep track of your blood sugar levels in an easy and convenient way. Blood Sugar Manager offers the following means to control your diabetes: - A quick way to enter your blood glucose level. - The ability to check all your past measurements. - Saving blood sugar level to your favorite calendar. - A converter, supporting two-way conversion between US unit (mg/dL) and international unit (mmol/L). - Statistics with the ability to compare your blood sugar levels with your own goals (Please consult your physician and set your maximum levels together). - Report generator (from version 1.7): HTML reports can be created for the last 7, 15 or 30 days, and shared by email, skype, bluetooth, or saved to your Google Drive. Feel free to get in touch with us, we value your feedback and are looking to improve blood sugar manager.
release_text: V2.1 - New calendar button in the entry form: you can easily save a measurement to your favorite calendar. - Android 5.1.1 compatibility added V2.0 - Added a switch to choose between mmol/L and mg/dL, so you can use both units when entering data. - Language update V1.9 Updated statistics. You can tap on the graph to display a blood sugar value. Updated reports, improved compatibility with the latest version of Gmail. New translations.

OPHTAclic Vision est une application qui vous permet de tester votre vue et prendre un rendez-vous avec un ophtalmologiste si vous constatez une baisse de vue. Vous pouvez même envoyer vos résultats de tests à votre ophtalmologiste. OPHTAclic Vision is an application that allows you to test your eyesight and make an appointment with an ophthalmologist if you experience any view. You can even send your test results to your ophthalmologist.

Want to know if your launcher is compatible ? please check here ( http://i262.photobucket.com/albums/ii87/pooley45/launchercompatibilitystatus20.png ) == FEATURES == * More than 300 icons and growing. * Works on Jelly Bean devices too. * Wallpaper included. == INSTRUCTIONS == To apply the theme : * Apex Launcher: Go to Apex settings > Theme settings * Nova Launcher: Go to Nova Settings > Look and feel > Icon Theme * ADW Launcher: On the home screen, press MENU > More > ADWSettings > Themes Preferences > Select your theme * Choose the theme from the list and apply it. To individually change any app's icon : * Nova/Apex: Long press that app icon > Edit > tap the icon > Icon Pack. Select the theme from the list and from there, you can select any icon. * ADW : Double tap app icon > Edit > Select theme from the top left corner dropdown > Select any of the icon. == FIX for Jelly Bean devices == If the theme is not working for you somehow, do the following - * Launch Titanium Backup and scroll down the list of installed apps. * Tap the downloaded theme app and tap backup. DON'T uninstall anything. * Tap the theme name again and restore the same backup that you had just created. Note: * If you get trouble to make it work on ADW, choose/apply another pack and then back to this pack (thank you Anders for that feedback). * If you have any problem please don't leave derogatory comments and 1 star reviews. Contact me first ;) == Specifics ==
release_text: Version 1.0.9 - Redo iconback, iconupon, - Iconmask feature added ! (you now should enjoy a more "homogeneous" iconset ;),

description: This set contains 8 skins :) Black, White, Blue, Green, Orange, Pink, Red and Yellow binary clock. ----------------------------------------------- Required ----------------------------------------------- UCCW (Ultimate Custom Clock Widget) free. Before Downloading this skin, make sure UCCW 2.1.2 or higher is already installed on your device : http://goo.gl/TZgw0 I recommand you use a launcher like Nova, it provides more flexibility in resizing widgets and have the overlay widgets option. ----------------------------------------------- [HOW TO] Install : ----------------------------------------------- 1 - Once you've downloaded/installed the skin, 2 - Add a UCCW widget to your homescreen (via long press on homescreen if you're running a launcher or via appdrawer if you're on stock ROM), 3 - When UCCW skins' list pops up, choose the skin to apply, 4 - Touch the pic, 5 - Enjoy :) ----------------------------------------------- [HOW TO] Use hotspots (new) : ----------------------------------------------- UCCW Skins can provide hotspots (or not) : This one got 2 hotspots. For the hotspots to work, in UCCW menu, turn Hotspot Mode ON. Now you can : - Touch the binary clock to access Clock app, - Touch the date to enter Calendar app, ----------------------------------------------- Tips ----------------------------------------------- - In the UCCW menu, if skin downloaded got a location and/or weather element, set the location to auto (if it's enable, then disable and enable it again for the location to work properly). - In UCCW skin's list, long press a skin to delete it, In some rare case your skin may not sho up in the UCCW skin list since there's a new encryption feature introduced in Jelly Bean. Google Play uses feature while installing skins. All third party themes and similar PAID apps like Beautiful widgets, Go launcher etc, are affected by this new encryption. If your are experiencing similar issue, please do not give this skin a bad rate, contact-me first ;) ----------------------------------------------- FYI : Visit my xda thread and download it for free (*.uzip) http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1700008 -----------------------------------------------

== FEATURES == * 1 icon back, 1 icon upon, so basically 100% of your icons are themed with this set. * Works on Jelly Bean devices too. * Wallpapers included. == INSTRUCTIONS == To apply the theme : * Apex Launcher: Go to Apex settings > Theme settings * Nova Launcher: Go to Nova Settings > Look and feel > Icon Theme * ADW Launcher: On the home screen, press MENU > More > ADWSettings > Themes Preferences > Select your theme * Choose the theme from the list and apply it. == FIX for Jelly Bean (ant. 4.2) devices == If the theme is not working for you somehow, do the following - * Launch Titanium Backup and scroll down the list of installed apps. * Tap the downloaded theme app and tap backup. DON'T uninstall anything. * Tap the theme name again and restore the same backup that you had just created. Note: * If you get trouble to make it work on ADW, choose/apply another pack and then back to this pack (thank you Anders for that feedback). * If you have any problem please don't leave derogatory comments and 1 star reviews. Contact me first ;)

Nouveau service d’encaissement pratique, performant et mobile, Dilizi s’adresse aux commerçants, artisans, professions libérales, associations et prestataires de services en mobilité. Véritable outil de caisse, sûr, simple et moderne, il répond également au besoin exprimé par les consommateurs qui souhaitent payer par carte bancaire en toutes circonstances (à domicile, sur un marché, …). Qu’est-ce que Dilizi en pratique ? Dilizi est un ensemble de services d’encaissement mobiles composé d’un lecteur de carte bancaire qui se connecte à un smartphone ou à une tablette et d’une application à télécharger [1] incluant les outils suivants : • Un catalogue produits personnalisable • La gestion des encaissements : historique, tri par vendeurs • Un tableau de bord : données consolidées graphiques • Un module de gestion de la relation client Quels sont les bénéfices pour l’utilisateur ? Dilizi est d’un usage simple, rapide et sa souscription est dématérialisée : le client s’enregistre en ligne auprès de la Banque Populaire ou de la Caisse d’Epargne. L’enregistrement peut, bien sûr, être effectué en agence, au choix du client. Dès réception du lecteur, sous deux ou trois jours, le client télécharge l’application gratuite et la mise en service est immédiate. Le matériel est sécurisé. Il est compatible avec la plupart des smartphones du marché. La tarification est claire, sans abonnement, sans engagement de durée. Le prix du lecteur est de 99 € HT et le service d’encaissement facturé 2 % HT par transaction. Il n’y a aucun minimum de facturation. A l’issue du paiement, le consommateur peut recevoir, immédiatement, son ticket de carte bancaire par SMS ou email. dilizi est un service proposé par les banques du Groupe BPCE, 2ème groupe bancaire français : Banque Populaire, Caisse d’Epargne … New collection service convenient, efficient and mobile Dilizi is aimed at traders, artisans, professionals, associations and service mobility. Real tool box, safe, simple and modern, it also responds to the need expressed by consumers wishing to pay by credit card at all times (at home, in a market ...). What Dilizi in practice? Dilizi is a set of mobile collection services consisting of a credit card reader that connects to a smartphone or a tablet and an application to download [1] including the following tools: • A customizable product catalog • The cash management history, sort by sellers • A dashboard: Consolidated graphical data • A module for customer relationship management What are the benefits for the user? Dilizi is a quick, easy usage and subscription cloud: the customer registers online with the Banque Populaire and Caisse d'Epargne. The recording can, of course, be done by agency, the customer's choice. Upon receipt of the reader, as two or three days, the client downloads the free application and commissioning is straightforward. The material is secure. It is compatible with most smartphones on the market. Pricing is clear, no subscription, no time commitment. The price of the drive is € 99 and the cashing service charged 2% tax per transaction. There is no minimum charge. After the payment, the consumer can receive immediately a ticket credit card by SMS or email.   dilizi is offered by banks Groupe BPCE, the second French banking group services: Banque Populaire, Caisse d'Epargne ...

Cette App est créé pour les Carrosseries et sert pour établir un contact directe avec les clients finaux. À travers cette application, chaque personne pourra recevoir les notifications concernant les promotions de la carrosserie (petites réparations, égratignures etc..) et demander un devis en cas de petites dommages (en compilant un simple formulaire et en mettant en ligne les photos de la partie endommagée). Cette application permet au client final d'appeler directement la carrosserie, aussi pour les urgences (en cas d'accident ou nécessité) This App is created for Bodies and serves to establish a direct contact with end customers. Through this application, each person can receive notifications regarding promotions of the body (minor repairs, scratches etc. ..) and request a quote for small damage (by compiling a simple form and by posting photos of damaged part). This application allows the end user to directly call the body, also for emergencies (in case of accident or necessity)

Here is the famous puzzle Peg Solitaire. The aim of the game is to achieve the game with only one pawn remaining. Will you find the good moves to succeed in this ? To drop a pawn, just jump it with an other pawn ! You'll find here all classic boards, to allow you to start with easy ones if you're not a regular on this game. For the best of you, the board editor will allow you to play on your own invention. Have a good game ! PS : Permissions are needed for the ad support.
release_text: Add a solver feature ! Add a move counter which doesn't increase when two successive moves used the same pawn. Fix a bug report Fix a minor display bug

description: ***THIS APP ENSURES COMPLETE PRIVACY AND IS BATTERY EFFICIENT.**** Social Boat is a next generation social and business networking app designed for smartphones on the basis of proximity. In Social boat, you as a user can identify yourself with various tags, that best describe you and your interests, either social or professional. you will show up to those users who are seeking you for their social or business needs, they just have to search by the tags. Your long time old buddy will someday show up in your proximity and you may never know, but social boat, will let you know. You are in a new place and looking for someone you know, look up in social boat and check if any of your friends are nearby. If you are not lucky search for those who speak your language. you want to avail a service and find someone nearby who will provide your needs. seek and you will find. Want to eat an ice-cream and you don't know when the ice-cream truck will pass by your house, tell social boat and it will notify you as the truck guy comes near your house. Distinct features 1. As a user, you can identify yourself with various tags that describes you and your interests. viz. #architect, #Bengali, #foodie, #soccer, #Naturalist, #bookseller etc. 2. Your location will be identified and shown on the maps. Social boat will ensure the minimum of your battery, thus being a '******* BATTERY EFFICIENT SOCIAL NETWORKING MAPS********. 3. Search for any user you seek by their tags and check if anyone if nearby and get connected through either facebook or google+ or email or phone. 4. You can choose, what contact details should be displayed to others for each tag, so that ***********PRIVACY OF USER IS NEVER COMPROMISED*********** 5. In social boat, you can create and manage your groups, and know their all groupmate's location in one glance. viz. friends, family, school, colleagues etc. A handy app to plan for reunions and alumni meets. 6. Social boat allows you to ping those users you are seeking to know the exact location details and check if the user is available to meet you before you proceed.

Business system to manage customer reservations/booking for hotel, pension car rental, hire service etc. . Data presentation prepared especially for small and large touchscreens. Easy management of customer groups, own reservable resources/services (like hotel room, cars for hire etc.). Main features: - secure ! All data only in the device ( no data in the internet/cloud ) - the ability to work offline (without an internet connection) - add, delete, move, or edit terms agreed with the customer, - overbooking error control - different search modes, - taking a photo with description, - customers management: contact data, groups, descriptions and notes, - resources management: (ex. room, car) in servie/out of service, description and note, - presentation of different customer groups by colors, - send messages directly from the application, - calling customers directly from an application, - create a copy of the data to a file (backup), - convenient operation on the phone as well as tablet, - supports horizontal and vertical screen orientation, - lifetime licence. - synchronize data between Phone and tablet via Bluetooth. - quick ( single click ) SMS messsaginig to many customers selected by group or by events date. - event reminder. - SMS reminders ( free option ) - easy import of phonebook contacts. In order to migrate data from the free version into this version of the app - simply import the data backup created in the free version. Copyright © GIMIN Studio

The Islamic (hijri) calendar is used by more than a 1.2 billion Muslims around the world to determine the main days of observance in the Islamic religious year. The Islamic calendar converter will be useful for determining the approximate Western equivalent for an Islamic calendar date and can also be used for converting historical Islamic calendar dates into Western calendar dates. You can use this application to convert Hijri A.H. and A. D. (Gregorian) dates using this easy and simple to use Android application. The best Android conversion tool from Gregorian calendar dates to the hijri dates.

description: Essential Clinical Practice Toolkit On-The-Go! The FREE MIMS app for your Mobile & Tablet devices delivers critical prescribing information, medical news and CME articles as well as clinical calculators essential to physicians’ daily practice needs. With MIMS available across multiple platforms and devices, you can now easily and conveniently find the most up-to-date and relevant clinical practice information you need anytime, anywhere. Download the FREE MIMS app and create your FREE account today! **************************************************************************** Key Features & Benefits: Drug Information - Physicians can improve patient outcomes through safe and effective use of medication at every point of care. MIMS provides physician with both concise and comprehensive drug prescribing information, in a quick-access mobile format. Medical Calculators - MIMS is also equipped with important clinical calculators and scoring tools useful for healthcare professionals in their clinical practice. Incorporating fast data input as well as instantaneous and clear clinical recommendations. News & CME - Keep abreast with medical news and updates in Asia through our renowned publications (Medical Tribune, JPOG, Oncology Tribune and many more) anytime and anywhere. MIMS Videos Series - Featuring video interviews of leading medical experts from various specialties, focusing on treatment options, disease management, latest updates and many more!
release_text: 1.Enhanced functionality: •Special Reports – Medical congress highlights and updates on drugs, diseases and clinical management trends •Disease Resources – At-a-glance disease management guidelines for quick referencing on-the-go •Medical Events – Be informed of upcoming medical events and congresses 2.Bug fixes v.1.3.1 ============================== 1. Bug fix for launcher issue 2. Fix crash issue for Android lollipop (v.5.0.x)

description: Tips diet harian ini di desain selama 7 hari dan dapat menurunkan berat badan sebanyak 4-7 kg per minggu. Program kesehatan dan diet ini awalnya dibuat untuk karyawan General Motors Corporation selama lebih dari 29 tahun. Penelitian tentang program diet ini ditemukan bahwa diet dapat digunakan sesering seseorang ingin menurunkan berat badan, tidak peduli berapa kali mereka melakukannya. Diet juga dianggap awalnya sebagai pembersih tubuh, pertama untuk membersihkan tubuh dari kotoran sebanyak mungkin, dan juga memperbaiki mental. Penemuan juga menyatakan bahwa karyawan yang diuji bekerja lebih efisien, karena mereka merasa lebih baik tentang diri mereka sendiri, mereka lebih ringan, lebih cepat dan memiliki lebih banyak energi daripada sebelumnya. Daily diet tips is designed for 7 days and can lose weight as much as 4-7 pounds per week. Health and diet program was originally created for the employees of General Motors Corporation for over 29 years. Research on this diet program found that the diet can be used as often as one would like to lose weight, no matter how many times they do it. Diet is also regarded initially as a body cleanser, first to cleanse the body of impurities as possible, and also improve mental. The findings also stated that employees are tested to work more efficiently, because they feel better about themselves, they are lighter, faster and have more energy than ever before.

Just find there is no build-in missed call reminder after buying an android phone? Did you ever miss important calls while you left your phone outside the meeting room? This is the must-have app for you. Whenever you have a missed call or unread message, this app will remind you by sound, vibration, LED, or lighting up your screen, for every 10 minutes, or other interval you set. Reminder continue to work until: (a) you open the call log screen or message box (b) you turn reminder off manually (c) exceed the max reminding time you set Features: * any combination of reminder target: call, sms, or mms. * any combination of reminder type: sound, vibration, LED, or screen on. * preference options include: reminder interval, reminder duration, max reminding time, reminder tone. * Auto silent when you set your phone in silent mode. (It’s an option) * Using ringer volume or media volume as your choice. * This app does not show up any visible message while working. So check the 'Screen On' is helpful to see what event occurs on system bar. This is an add-on to system function, not replacement. * Support app2sd Changes in version 2.0: * [Quick Stop] to stop reminder easily. * Add LED as reminder option. (LED may not work on every device) * Now you can set different tones, different LED colors for call and message, to distinguish what you received. * Auto silent and vibrate off when you set your phone in silent mode. * Build-in simple HELP document. Other notes: * Though this app works as a resident service, it does not consume your valuable power when standing-by in background. No any polling code inside. It works only when specified event occurs. For example, an incoming message received. Known issue: * If you have missed call from viber, opening viber's call log can not stop the reminder. You need to open original system's call log.
release_text: Bugs Fixed: (1) LED flashing while phone call in progress (2) LED flashing even disabled
